title: Amathumbu asuthiko aveza imiphumela emihle
author: More Matshediso
text:
ezilithoba abafunda ee- nkolweni zombuso ezingeli- zweni loke bayakwazi uku- qalana nomsebenzi wabo wesikolo wangamalanga. Lokhu kuphumelele nge- nca yesizo lehlelo likarhu- lumende eliqinisekisa bona amathumbu wabo ahlala asuthi ukugoma okunepilo. Um Nyango wezeFundo esiSekelo (i-DBE), ngeHle- lo leliZweloke lokoNdliwa eenKolweni (i-NSNP), ufike- lele bewadlula umnqopho wawo wokunikela ngokugo- ma ebafundini abama-75% ngelizweni.
UmLawuli  we-NSNP  e- 
mNyangweni wezeFun- do esiSekelo, u-Neo Rak- wena, uthe iinkolo ezizii- 20 619 zipheka beziphakele abafundi abangaba ziingidi ezili-9 032 622 elizweni loke qobe ngelanga.
Uthe  iinkolo  ezingaka-fakwa ehlelweneli kufuze zithintane nama-ofisi wo- mnyango weeyingi nangange zifuna ukungeniswa ehle- lweni.
Emnyakeni weemali wee- 2015/16, i-NSNP yabelwa iingidigidi ezi-5 703 zama- randa.
U-Rakwena uthe imali ese- tjenziswa ehlelweneli ikhu- tjhulwa qobe ngomnyaka ukwenzela bona ikhambi- sane nentengotjhuguluko yezinto ebizwa nge-infle- yitjhini, begodu isabelo seemali somnyaka wee- 2017/18 sibalelwa eengidi- gidini ezisi-6.4 zamaranda. Ihlelweli liphelisa indlala yesikhathi esifitjhani be- godu linomthelela omuhle kezehlalakuhle  yabafundi. “ Abantwana abanengi babuya emakhaya atlhaga- ko angakghoni ukondla kuhle abentwana, begodu kabanye abafundi, ukugo- ma kwesikolweni ngikho kwaphela	ukugoma aba- nakho ngelanga. Ukondliwa kwabentwana kwesikolweni
kunomthelela omuhle e- kghonweni lokufunda, eku- laleleni nokuzwisiswa ii- mfundo ezethulwako be- godu nekuzibandakanyeni emisebenzini yangetlasini,” utjhwe njalo u-Rakwena.
Izinga lokuzitlolisa be- godu nelokuza kwabafu- ndi esikolweni likhuphukile ngokukhuthazwa lihlelo le-NSNP. Mvanje, iKhabi- nethi iphasise ukukhutjhwa komBiko omalungana no- kuH l u n gw a kw e - NS N P okwenziwe mNyango we- zokuHlela, ukuTjheja noku- Hlunga (i-DPME). Umbiko lo uveza ipumelelo namaga- dango angathathwa ngo- mnqopho wokuthuthukisa ihlelweli.
UmLawuli wezokuHlunga
kwa-DPME, uJabu Mathe, uthe umnqopho omkhulu wokuhlunga bekukuhloli- sisa bona i-NSNP yethulwa ngendlela ezokuletha imi- phumela emihle nenqotjhi- weko efundweni nezama- philo wabafundi.
Ubuyelele  waveza  ukuthi
umnqopho omkhulu wehle- lweli kukwenza ngcono ubu- jamo bamaphilo nebokwa- khela kwemizimba yabafun- di beSewula Afrika abavela emakhaya adosa emhlweni. Ihlelo liqale khulu abafundi boke abasezingeni elibizwa nge-quintile 1-3 eenkolweni zombuso, ezibalelwa ema- 60% weenkolo ezitlhagako zeSewula Afrika.
Ihlelweli libuya godu lisiza
nangokuphelisa umtlhago emiphakathini ngokuvula amathuba wemisebenzi.
“ Ukuhlunga kur hub - hulule bekwaveza bona i-NSNP inikela ngamathu- ba angaphezulu kwee 
50 000 zab aseb enzi abaphekako nabaphake- la abafundi ngokuzi- nikela qode ngelanga, be- godu bathokozwa ngemali ema-960 wamaranda qobe ngenyanga,” utjhwe njalo u-Mathe.
“ Lokhu kutjho bona ii-
ngidi ezima-576 zamaranda ngomnyaka zisetjenziselwa ukuthokoza amavolontiya amalunga womphakathi”.
Ihlelweli livuselela ama- ndla womnotho emabubu- lweni asakhasako, aphakathi namancani begodu nee- nkhamphani ezikulu ziyazu- za njengabethuli bemisebe- nzi eemfundeni ezizenzela umsebenzi ngokusebenzisa iinkhamphani zangeqadi (zona ngilezi, yiKwaZu- lu-Natala, i-Gauteng, iMpu- malanga neTlhagwini Kapa). “Ukuthengwa kwemirorho
ebalimini  abasemphakathi-
ni kuzuzisa iinkolo nemi- phakathi begodu lokhu kuvuselela imisebenzi ye- zokulima eyenziwa mi- phakathi.
Umbiko ubuye waveza bona isifunda seTjingala- nga Kapa, seMpumalanga, seGauteng, se Pumalanga Kapa, seTlhagwini Kapa neseTlhagwini Tjingalanga
zilisebenze kuhle ihlelweli eminyakeni edlulileko.

title: I-Central Application Clearing House (CACH) yomNyaka wee-2018
author: vukuzenzele unnamed
text:
Central Application Clearing House (i-CACH) lihlelo lesikhatjhana elahlonywa mNyango wezeFundo ePhakemeko nokuBandula ngomnqopho wokusiza ilutjha elilungele ukuyokufunda emazikweni wefundo ephakemeko ngaphasi kweRherho leFundo nokuBandulwa kweZinga eliPhakemeko (i-PSET), kodwana baqalene nobujamo obuthileko obungaba kukuthi:
Bafaka iimbawo kusese nesikhathi emazikweni akhethwe ngibo kodwana iimbawo zabo akhange zamukelwe begodu sekungemva kwesikhathi sokufaka iimbawo kezinye iindawo.
Akhange bafake iimbawo ngombana bebangaﬁkeleli iimfuneko ezibekiweko zokungena ngokuya kwemiphumela yabo yeGreyidi ye-11) kodwana imiphumela yabo yeGreyidi ye-12) mihle begodu iﬁkelela iimfuneko ezibekiweko zokungena ezikwenelo.
Akhange bafake iimbawo kusese nesikhathi ngonobangela othileko namkha akhange bafake iimbawo nakanye.
Umfundi bekanganalwazi lokobana uzokufundelani ngemva kokuqeda iGreyidi ye-12.
Umfundi bekazi bona ufuna ukufundela liphi ibizelo kodwana anganasiqiniseko sokuthi ukhethe ibizelo elisemkhakheni omlungeleko.

Imisebenzi eyenziwa yi-CACH Ifaka Hlangana uku:
siza ngokufakwa kweembawo zokufunda emazikweni wama-PSET (emaYunivesithi, emaYunivesithi weThekhnoloji, emaKholiji weChwephetjhe newokuFundela imiSebenzi (ama- TVET) nemazikweni alawulwa mKhandlu weFundo naMandla wokuThwasisa.
nikela ngelwazi malungana nesizo leemali (ilwazi nge- NSFAS).
nikela umsebenzi wokuthuthukisa ibizelo lomsebenzi (ngokweluleka, ngelwazi, ngokubonisa, ukuhlela nokunikela ilwazi lebizelo lomsebenzi malungana nokusizwa ngeemali nangezinye iindlela zokuthola isekelomali).
Isekelo lomsebenzi wezandla (IZiko eliThuthukisa ukuSekelwa komSebenzi weZandla leliZweloke).

Umsebenzi we-CACH uthoma mhlana ama-3 kuTjhirhweni wee-2018, phambidlana nje kokukhutjhwa kwemiphumela yeGreyidi ye-12 begodu uzokuraga bekube sekupheleni kukaMhlolanja wee-2018.
Isebenza Bunjani i-CACH?
Isigaba soku-1: Abafundi abangakatholi iinkhala emazikweni abafake kiwo iimbawo, namkha abasafunana namathuba wokufunda emazikweni we-PSET, bangathintana ne-CACH ngenomboro yomrhala yasimahla ethi:
0800 356 635, ngobunzinzolwazi obuthi: www.dhet.gov.za namkha bangasebenzisa i-SMS ebiza ngokujayelekileko (ngokuthumela ibizo lomfundi neNomboro kaMazisi nge-SMS ku: 49200) namkha bangatlolisa ngokwe-inthanethi. Begodu bangathola ilwazi elingezelelweko ekhasini le-Facebook (CACH_SA).

Isigaba sesi-2: Abasebenzeli bazokwenza ilandelela ngokudosela simahla abafundi abaphumelele kuhle, ukusuka ezikweni lokuthintana begodu bebatlolise yoke imininingwana efunekako kudathabheyizi ye-CACH, baveze umkhakha webizelo lefundo elikhethwe mfundi begodu nesifunda aﬁsa ukuyofunda kiso.

Isigaba sesi-3: Imininingwana yomfundi ofake isibawo kunye nemiphumela yeGreyidi ye-12 izokuhlolisiswa kuthi ngemva kwalokho idluliselwe emazikweni wezefundo ephezulu bona nakukghonakalako bamukelwe bayokufunda kilawo maziko.

Isigaba sesi-4: Umsebenzi we-CACH uzokuba kuhlolisisa iminini- ngwana yomfundi begodu uyidlulisele phambili emazikweni asese neenkhala. Nangabe isikhala sikhona begodu umfundi ofake isibawo unazo zoke iimfuneko ezifunekako, amaziko wona ngokwawo azokuthintana nomfundi ofake isibawo.

Amaphuzu ekufuze atjhejwe
I-CACH angeze yaqinisekisa ubukhona besikhala sokufunda emfundini ofake isibawo .
I-CACH angeze yatjho bona amaziko azomthinta nini umfundi ofake isibawo sokufunda malungana nekghonakalo yokumamukela.

I-CACH ibasiza bunjani abafundi abafake iimbawo kwaphela kodwana bangazi bona bafuna ukufundela liphi ibizelo namkha labo abanganazo iimfuneko ezifunekako zokungena eHlelweni le-PSET?
Umsebenzi we-CACH wethulwa ngokubambisana nemiSebenzi yokuThuthukiswa kwamaBizelo womSebenzi weliZweloke (i-CDS)
osiza ngokunikela ngelwazi elidephileko lamabizelo wokusebenza begodu nokuyelelisa ngo:
Mkhakha wamabizelo womsebenzi kunye nokufunda.
Kukhetha iimfundo.
Kunikela ngelwazi elimalungana nokubuyelelwa kweenhlahlubo.
Kukhuphula imiphumela yeGreyidi ye-12.
Kuletha amathuba wokufunda alethwa lihlelo le-PSET.
Kuletha isizo leemali nangezinye iindlela zesekelomali.
Kunikela ngelwazi elimalungana neekambiso zeembawo begodu namalanga wokuvala.
Kunikela ngelwazi leembawo zesibili zaphakathi komnyaka begodu namalanga wokutlolisa.

Omunye nomunye onerhuluphelo lokufumana isizo kebakwa-CDS angathintana nabo ngoMrhala Wesizo ngokulandela iindlela ezingenzasi:
Thumela umbuzwakho nge-SMS namkha uthumele i- ‘please call me’ ku: 072 204 5056, namkha
Dosela ku: 086 999 0123, ekumrhala wokwabelana ngelwazi, ukusukela ngoMvulo bekube ngeLesihlanu phakathi kwe-iri lobu-8:00 ekuseni nele-4:30 ntambama,
Thumela i-imeyi ku: careerhelp@dhet.gov.za
Vakatjhela ama-oﬁsi wethu ase- 123 Francis Baard Street, ePitori.
IKhasi le-Facebook lithi: www.facebook.com/careerhelp,
namkha
Thwithela ku: www.twitter.com/rsacareerhelp

Amathuba wokusizwa ngurhulumende ngeemali? Kunamathuba ahlukahlukeneko wokusizwa ngeemali wabafundi abasemazikweni aphakemeko wokufunda, alethwa yi-Funza Lushaka Bursary Scheme, isiKhwama seliZweloke seSizo leeMali zokuFunda (i-NSFAS), I-Rural Education Access Programme, umNyango wezokuThuthukiswa komPhakathi, umNyango wezeSayensi neThekhnoloji begodu nomNyango wezamaPhilo.

Ngubani Ongafaka Isibawo Sokusizwa Ngeemali? Abafundi beSewula Afrika abangathanda ukuyofunda emazikweni wefundo ephakemeko bayamenywa bona bavakatjhele i-Oﬁsi yokuSizwa ngeeMali emazikweni akhethwe ngibo.

title: Isithunzi Esinikelwa Abongazimbi Abaphuluke Ekusahlelweni Ngokomseme
author: Noluthando Motswa
text:
UmKhulumeli womNyango wezamaphilo we-Gauteng, u-Lesemang Matuka uthe abongazimbi esikhathini esi dlulileko begade bakhamba amabanga amade bona ba finyelele isizweli. Ukuhlo nywa ngobutjha kwezikweli kuzokusiza abantu be-Ka-tlehong, Thokoza, Vosloorus nebeendawo eziseduze.
“Simnyango, sisebenza ngamandla bona senze amaphilo wabantu boke abengcono ngokuthi sibandule besithuthukise ilwazi labasebenzi bomkhakha wezamaphilo ngokubanikela amakghono akhethekileko ukwenzela bona bakwazi uku sebenzisana nabongazimbi bobulelesi.
Eminyakeni emithathu edluleko, abasebenzi beza maphilo abali-106 baqede isi Fundo se-Sexual Assault Care Practitioners.” Uthe umnya ngwakhe uzoragela phambili usebenzisane neeNhlangano eziNgasizo zoMbuso (ama-NGO) nezinye iinhlangano ezisizako ukunikela ngesekelo lomkhumbulo ngoko mbono wokhandela izehlakalo ezinjalo kunokutjheja esele batlhorisiwe. Ama-Thuthuzela Care Centres asungulwa ngomnqopho wokobana enze ngcono ikambiso yokubika amacala wokugagadlhela na-manye amacala wezomseme.
Njenganje, abongazimbi sebathola isizo ngendlela ehloniphekileko nesebujameni obunetjhejo elihle. Amaziko la asetjenziswa bekalawulwa liBandla lezokuTjhutjhisa leliZweloke (i-NPA), ngoku sebenzisana nomnyango wezamaPhilo, wokuThuthu kiswa komPhakathi newezo buLungiswa nokuThuthuki swa komThethosisekelo, kunye nemiSebenzi yeButho lamaPho lisa weSewula Afrika (i-SAPS). IZiko lokuthoma lavulwa esi Bhedlela i-Chris Hani Barag wanath ngomnyaka wee-2000.
UDorh Efadzwa Tipoy, ompha thi omkhulu kezokwelapha nomdosiphambili weSinakekelwe Thuthuzela Care Centre, uyelelise amalunga womphakathi bona nakwenze kako bona babe bongazimbi bokutlhoriswa ngokomseme, kuqakathekile bona babike izehlakalo emazikweni msinyana ngendlela ekungakghonakala ngayo.
Amaziko la anikela ngesizo lokwelapha ngomnqo pho wokuvikela amagulo athathelana ngokomseme afaka phakathi i-Hepatitis B  neNgogwana yeNtumbanto nga (i-HIV).
Amapilisi aziinkhandeli zokuba sebantwini aphiwa abongazimbi  bokutlhoriswa ngokomseme namkha aba katiweko. Ungahlambi; iza nezembatho obegade uze-mbethe nawuzokubika ezi kweni,uziphuthele ngephe pha elinzotho; ungaziphutheli ngetjhegasi” kutjho uDorh Tipoy. Ungezelele ngokuthi solo kwavulwa izikweli, sekunomehluko omkhulu esizweni ebanikelana ngalo begodu nesithunzi sabantu sesibuyisiwe begodu njenga nje sebangahlamba khona na baqeda ukuhlolwa. Omunye umraro umtholapilo ohlanga bezana nawo ngewokobana abantu kanengi beza ngemva kwesikhathi – kuqakathekile bona ubufakazi bubuthele lwe, nemitjhoga bayinikelwe kungakadluli ama-iri ama-72 ngemva kokusahlelwa.

title: Amasana asanda ukubelethwa ngiwo ase ngozini ekulu yokubanjwa yiListeriosisa
author: vukuzenzele unnamed
text:
umNyango wezama Philo ugade nge lihlo elibukhali ukubhebhetheka kobu lwele be-Listeriosis, ngono bangela wemibiko eli-119 eseyibikiwe ukusukela mhlana ama-5 kuNoba yeni. Ngokupheleleko,  sekubikwe izehlakalo ezima-727 zokuqubuka kobu lwelobu neziqinisekiswe malabhorathri emnyakeni wee-2017.
IZiko lokuLawulwa  nokuKhandelwa kwamaGu lo lihlathulula i-Listeriosis njengeyingozi khulu ko dwana ikugula okwelaphe kako nokukhandelekako okubangelwa mumulwana we-Listeria monocytogenes. Utholakala ehlabathini, ema-nzini nemirorhweni. Imikhiqizo yefuyo – enjengenyama nebisi elisengwako, imikhi qizo yelwandle nemirorho emitjha efana neenthelo nomrorho kungasuleleka ngomulwana lo osuka ema-nzini namkha ehlabathini.
 Nanyana irhubhululo lithi omunye nomunye umuntu angathola i-Listeriosis, ko dwana abasengozini ekulu yokuhlaselwa kugulokhu masana asanda ukubelethwa, babantu esele baluphele, bo-mma abasebantwini, nabantu abanamasotjha womzimba abuthakathaka ngonobangela weNgogwana yeNtu mbantonga (i-HIV), ubulwele betjhukela, ikankere, ukugula kwesibindi namkha kweziso.  Iinqhema zabantu ezithi nteka khulu masana asanda ukubelethwa – lawo anamalangana wokuthoma angaba ma-28 wokuphila, kunye nabantu abaneminyaka ephakathi kweli-15 ukuya kema-49. Iinqhema embilezi zenza ama-70% wezehlakalo zobulwelobu esele zibikiwe.
UmNyango ukhombela abomma abasebantwini bona bazitlolise ku-MomConnect ukwenzela bona bathole ilwazi elitjha malungana ne-Lister iosis njengoba amasana asa nda ukubelethwa angaphasi kwamalanga ama-28 ubudala kungiwo athinteka khulu.
 “Nasiqala iimbalobalo zabantu abathinteke khulu, sithola bona kizo zoke iinqhe mezi ezibuthakathaka, amasana asanda ukubele thwa ngiwo athinteke khulu. Nasihlaziya ngokuya kwemi nyaka yeenqhema ukusukela ekubelethweni ukuya emi nyakeni ema-93, amasana asanda ukubelethwa  wona wodwa alinganiselwa ema-40% wezehlakalo ezibikiweko,” kutjho uNgqongqotjhe wezamaPhilo uDorh Aaron Motsoaledi.

UNgqongqotjhe ukhombele abasebenzi bezamaphilo bona basebenze ngokutjhe-jisisa nabanyanga abomma abasebantwini.  “Isibawo esiqakatheke khulu esiya kubasebenzi bezamaphilo nomphakathi wokana kukobana ninikele itjhejo elingeneleleko kibo boke abomma abasebantwini. Nitjhejisise khulu nanisebe-nza ngabomma abaseba ntwini namkha amasana asanda ukubelethwa,” ubeke watjho.

Uzitlolisa njani kuMomConnect:
• Qinisekisa ukuba sebantwini kwakho emtholapilo. 	
• Gandelela u: *134*550# ngomaliledinini wakho bona uzitlolise.
• Phendula imibuzo elula eembalwa malungana nokuba sebantwini kwakho.
• Ngemva kwalokho uzakutloliswa.
• Ukuba	sebantwini kwakho kutloliswa ebuthelelweni  lemininingwana. 
• Abasebenzisi	behlelweli bafumana imilayezo  nge-SMS qobe ngeveke ngomnqopho wokubazisa ngelwazi lokuba sebantwini kwabo begodu  nangepilo yesana (bekube kula umntwana  sekanomnyaka	munye ubudala). 	Nakafuna ilwazi elidephileko, amalunga womphakathi angadosela iZiko lobuJamo obuRhabekileko le-National Institute for Communicable Diseases (i-NICD) ngeenkhathi zomsebenzi kinasi inomboro: 011 386 2000. AbaSebenzi bezamaPhilo bangadosela eMrhaleli wezeSizo we-NICD ukwenzela bona bathole iSizo eliRhabekileko lezokwElapha ngemva kweenkhathi zokusebenza ku:  082 883 9920.

title: Siza Ukukhandela ILanga Lokoma Kere Kweempompo More Matshediso
author: More Matshediso
text:
I-DWS ithi ukubalela khulu ngikho okubange lomraro, nga leyindlela-ke nomthamo wama damu nawo solo uya ngokwehla.
 Lokhu-ke sekukatelele iimphathimandla ukuthi zithathe amagadango wokuriyadisa iLa-nga Lokoma Kere Kweempompo, mhlazana iimpompo zalendawo zingaphela amanzi zome kere.  IDorobha leKapa selilinganisela izakhamuzi amanzi ezingawasebenzisa, ngesilinganiso esiyi-6B. Lokhu-ke kutjho ukuthi ngelanga linye umuntu ngamunye uvunye-lwe ukusebenzisa ama-50 wamalitha kwaphela namkha ngaphasi kwalokho; lesisilinganiso-ke sisebenza ekhaya, emsebenzini, esikolweni namkha nanyana kukuphi.
 Nanyana idorobheli liqalene nemizamo yoke yokukhandela iLanga Lokoma Kere Kweempo-mpo ukuthi lingafiki nje, kodwana lithi ngahlanye kufuze lilungele nokulawula amanzi wedoro bheli abambelele namkha ongeke bekuyokufika ubusika.
“Amanzi sizowavala nakufumaniseka ukuthi umthamo wama-nzi emadamini ehla abe ayo-kufika emaphesenteni ali-13.5 selaphelele woke. Umthamo wamanzi emadamini ungafika emaphesenteni ali-13.5, kuzakuthonywa ukuvalwa kwerherho lokudlulisa amanzi, ngaphandle kweendaweni eziqakatheke khulu, njengeendaweni zamabhizini si neembhedlela,” kutjho isitati mende seDorobha leKapa. Nasele kwenzeke lokho, izakha muzi kuzakufanela ziyokuphaka amanzi eendaweni ezikhe-thiweko ezizakumenyezelwa, khona edorobheni. Umuntu ngamunye uzakuphaka ama-25 wamalitha wamanzi ngelanga.
 Idorobha leKapa lihlome iZiko lezeHlekelele (i-DOC) kobanyana lizokusebenzisa iHlelo LezeHlekelele YaManzi, elizakusebenza nange kungaFika iLanga Lokoma Kere Kweempompo.
Imithombo namkha  IimpetsiUMasipala weDorobha leKapa uwukhalima ngamagama abukha li umukghwa wokusetjenziswa kwemithombo namkha iimpetsi, begodu uthi ukusetjenziswa kwemithombo namkha  iimpetsi ukusezela ngekasa kuzakuvunye-lwa isikhathi esingadluliko e-aweni linye, ngaboLesibili nangaboMgqibelo, ngapha-mbi kwe-awa lethoba ekuseni nangemva kwe-awa lesithandathu ntambama.

“Ukusetjenziswa kwemithombo namkha iimpetsi kufanele kulinganiswe ngamamithara alinganisa amanzi asetjenzisiweko, begodu boke abasebenzisi bawo  kufanele babe nerekhodi elizakunande lihlolwa,” kutjho umkhandlu wedorobha.
Umkhandlu wedorobha ungeze-lela ngokuthi izakhamuzi ku fanele zithole imvumo kwa-DWS nazifuna ukuthengisa namkha ukuthenga imithombo namkha iimpetsi.  Njengengcenye yemizamo karhulumende yokulawula ukuse-tjenziswa kwamanzi, i-DWS ithi iimphathimandla zibeka imibandela eqinileko yokulinganise-lwa amanzi, ukuqinisekisa ukuthi sihlonitjhwa mbala isilinganiso samanzi esibekiweko.
IDorobha leKapa lisebenzisana nanesiqhema eseluse ukuthotje-lwa komthetho nanePhiko eliKhethekileko lezePhenyo, kobanyana kuzokuqinisekiswa ukuthi imibandela yamanzi iyathotjelwa.  Izephulamthetho Zithathelwa Amagadango UmNyango wezaManzi noku Hlwengisa ngaManzi mhlapha usandukuphuma ijima elihlanga nyelweko lokufuna nokukhalima umukghwa wokusetjenziswa kwamanzi ngokuphambene nomthetho eMfuleni.
Lelijima beliqothele ukuthola boke abephula imibandela yokusetjenziswa kwamanzi ebekiweko, khulukhulu iindawo zokuhlanzela iinkoloyi ezingakatloliswa.  “Ngokwemibandela 6B  yokulinganiselwa ukusetjenziswa kwamanzi ebekwe liDorobha leKapa, amanzi kamasipalada aselwako akakwazi ukusetje-nziselwa ukuhlanza iinkoloyi. Iindawo zokuhlanzela iinkoloyi ezingakatloliswa zisebenzisa amanzi amanengi khulu.  Aba-nikazi beendawo zokuhlanzela iinkoloyi ezingakatloliswa basebenzisa amaphayiphu kilamabhizinisi wabo, kanti abanye basebenzisa amanzi aphuma epompini,” kutjho umnyango. Nanyana babanengi nje abazenda bezamanzi abasebenzela ukukukhandela iLanga Lokoma Kere Kweempompo, kodwana iDorobha leKapa lisakhombela izakhamuzi zalo ukuthi zibe nendima ebonakalako yokubabalela nokubulunga amanzi.
“Sikhombela boke abasebenzisi bamanzi ukuthi bahlanganyele emizameni yokongiwa kwamanzi yesiQhema seDorobha leKapa,” kutjho iSekela likaMeyara  weDorobha leKapa u-Ian Neil son.

title: Buyisa amandlakho, bika imilandu yokukata
author: Adele Schormann
text:
Ukuba ngungazimbi wokukatwa namkha wokukhahlunyezwa ngezomseme ngenye yezinto ezisihluku khulu umuntu angakhe ahlangabezane nazo.
Kungakho-ke nje amaPholi sa weButho leSewula Afrika (i-SAPS) avule amahlelo neendlela ezizakwenza kube lula bekuphephe nokuphepha ukuthi abantu babike imilandu enje.  UmKhulumeli wezama Pholisa eMpumalanga u-Colo nel Mtsholi Bhembe uthi kuqa kathekile ukuthi umphakathi usebenzisane namapholisa begodu ubike imilandu enje.  “Thina njengamapholisa kusibopho sethu ukwenza umsebenzi oqakathekileko wokuqinisekisa ukuthi izephulamthetho ziyabotjhwa, zigwetjwe, abongazimbi babe sezandleni eziphephileko. Sikhuthaza umphakathi uku thi uvele uzokubika imilandu yokukata eenteyitjhini zamapholisa zangemakhabo, na-mkha eziseduze nawo,” kutjho uBhembe.
  Abongazimbi ababikele ama pholisa ngemilandu epha thelene nezomseme ku-ngakapheli ama-awa ama-72 imilandu leyo yenzekile. UBhembe uyelelisa abongazimbi bokukatwa uku thi bafune nesizo lezazi zo kuthoba ukukhahlumezeka kwengqondo nomzimba nabakhe bavelelwa bubumbi bokukatwa.  “Kungenzeka uzizwe usi laphazekile, ufune uku hlamba ngokubuyelelweko, uzizwe unevalo lokuphumela ngaphandle ube hlangana nabantu. Koke lokhu zi-zinto ezijayelekileko nawukhe wavelelwa budisi bokukatwa. Nokho-ke khumbula ukuthi kukhona lapho ungafumana khona isizo ngakho kokokhu,” kuhlathulula uBhembe. I-Greater Rape Intervention Project (i-GRIP) ingelinye lamahlelo asiza abongazimbi bokukatwa ukuthi bazihlolisele iNgogwana yeNtumbantonga  neNtumbantonga ngokwayo (i-HIV/Aids) nezinye izifo.

 USohlalakuhle we-GRIP uThandiwe Maseko uthi ihlanganwabo le itjheja abongazimbi bokukatwa. “Sitjheja abongazimbi, sibahlalise endaweni ephe-phileko bekufike isikhathi la sebakghona khona ukukhuluma. Sinabathobi bomkhu-mbulo nabayelelisi abapha-mbili, abanetjhejo elihle khulu, abahlala balindele ukusiza,” kuhlathulula uMaseko.

Uwubika Bunjani Emapholiseni Umlandu Wokukatwa:

■ Thoma ngokuya eMtholapilo uyokuhlolwa bodorhodere namkha abahlengikazi. Umbiko wokuhlolwa kwakho uzakuba yingcenye yobufakazi emlandwini ozawuvula emapholiseni, begodu umbiko loyo uzakusiza amapholisa ukuthi akwazi ukubopha iselelesi esikuleleseleko.

 ■  Iya esitetjhini samapholisa sangekhenu namkha esiseduze nawe uyokuvula umlandu. Ipholisa elizakusiza esitetjhini samapholisa lizakubuza imibuzo ephathelene nobuwena, likubuze nangokuthi kwenzekeni, ngalokho ozokubika. Phendula imibuzo ngeqiniso, ulinge ukukhumbula yoke imininingwana ngokwenzekileko kilokho okukuveleleko.  Kungenzeka kube yindlela ebudisi nebuhlungu le yokuvula umlandu, kodwana ekugcineni imininingwana ozayinikela amapholisa leyo ngiyo kanye ezakusiza ephenyweni lawo.  ■ Khombela ipholisa elikusizako ukuthi likuphe iindlela zokuthintana nalo (iinomboro zamafoni nezinye iindlela zokuthintana ezingaba khona), kobanyana uzokwazi ukulithinta ubuze ukuthi ingangani indima yephenyo. Nalo ipholisa eliphenyako lizakuthinta nayibe kuneminye imininingwana esafunekako kuwe.  

 ■  Khombela ipholisa elikusizako ukuthi likuphe iindlela zokuthintana nalo (iinomboro zamafoni nezinye iindlela zokuthintana ezingaba khona), kobanyana uzokwazi ukulithinta ubuze ukuthi ingangani indima yephenyo. title: Vikela Abobhejani Bekhethu
author: More Matshediso
text:
Umbiko lo ufaka nekotara yokugcina yomnyaka wee-2017 lapho uveza khona inengi lababotjhiweko, abasaphenywako nalabo ababekwe amacala wo kuzuma ngokungasi semthe-thweni bekubulawe abobhejani nabakhukhuthisa abobhejani nokwehla kwezinga lokubulawa kwabobhejani enarheni mazombe ngomnyaka wee-2017 kubulewe abayi-1028 nawumadanisa nangomnyaka wee-2016 lapho kubulewe abayi-1054.
Ngomnyaka wee-2017 babunane abafunyanwa bebemukwa iimpo ndo zabobhejani edoyelweni leemphaphamtjhini e-OR Tambo International Airport, abasolwa ekuzumeni abobhejani ngoku ngasi semthethweni bama-502 kanti abali-16 babanjelwa ukukhukhuthisa iimpondo. Lokhu kwaletha isibalo sababanjiweko ema-518 ekulizinga elehlileko ukusukela ema-680 ngomnyaka wee-2016.
“Okudanisako kukuthi ama-21 wezelelesezi kwaba ziinsebenzi zomnyango lo ezibandakanyeke emilandwini yokubulawa nokukhukhuthiswa kweempo ndo zabobhejani ngomnyaka wee-2017,” kutjho uNgqongqo tjhe u-Molewa.
Ukukhandela ukubulawa kwabobhejaniURhulumende nababambisani bakhe bajamise izakhiwo ezithi leko azokusebenzisana nazo ekukhandeleni ukubulawa kwabobhejani. Lokho kufaka hlangana amahlelo wokwelusa eenqiwini zeenyamazana noku sebenzisa amahlelo wethekhnolo ji enarheni yoke.
Phakathi kukaTjhirhweni no Nobayeni wee-2017, abobhejani abama-504 bazunywa ngokungasi semthethweni bebabulawa esi Qiwini seeNyamazana i-Kruger National Park (KNP), okwaletha imbalo ema-24% phasi kunaleyo yabobhejani abama-662 ababulawa  ngomnyaka wee-2016.
“Lokho kwaba miphumela emi hle yeqhinga elitjha lokukhandela ukubulawa kwabobhejani e-KNP ngalokho kwabonakala ukwehla khulu kwesibalo sezenzo ezinje esiqiwini seenyamazana. Isibalo sezehlakalo zangomnyaka wee-2017 sibe zii-2 662 nakumadani swa nee-2 883 zangomnyaka wee-2016.  Lokhu kutjho bona izehlakalwezi zehle ngama-7.6%,” kuqinisekisa uNgqongqotjhe.
Nanyana kunjalo, isibalo sokubulawa kwabobhejani sikhuphukile eemfundeni ezilandelako, KwaZulu-Natala, eTlhagwini Kapa, eMpumalanga, eFreyistata neTlhagwini Tjingalanga.
Umthelela Phezu KomnothoUkuzunywa nokubulawa kwa bobhejani nokukhukhuthiswa kweempondo zabo nezinye iimbandana kube nomthelela omumbi ekuthuthukeni komno tho nekuvulweni kwamathuba wemisebenzi ngenarheni. Lokhu kufaka hlangana ukuthuthukiswa komnotho omifundafunda na-mkha ohlukahlukeneko weze mvelo ofaka hlangana umkhakha wezokuvakatjha.
“Ukulahlekelwa namkha ukutjhatjalaliswa kweenyamazana eziqakathekileko neziligugu kangaka  eSewula Afrika ezi njengobhejani, obalwa hlangana  neenyamazana ezingeziKulu eziHlanu ezazizwa ngokuthi ma-‘Big Five’  kungaba nomthelela omumbi phezu kwekareko yeemvakatjhibukeli yokuza eSe wula Afika. Iimvakatjhibukeli ezinengi ezivakatjhela iSewula Afrika zifuna ukubona iinya mazanezi ezaziwa ngama-‘Big Five’, ekungilezi: ubhejani, ibhubezi, inyathi, ingwe nendlovu,” lesi sitatimende esikhutjhwe mNyango wezeBhoduluko.
Ukuzuma okungasisemthe thweni nokubulawa kwabobhe jani kuvezwe njengezenzo ezi beka ivikeleko lenarha engozini begodu kungaba nomthelela omumbi ekarekweni yeemvaka tjhibukeli ezifuna ukuza eSewula Afrika kanti godu urhulumende umemezele tjhatjhalazi ukobana ubulelesobu buthathwa nje ngobuliqaloqangi emsebenzini wezokuvikelwa kwenarha.
Izenzwezi ezingasi semthe thweni zokubulwa kwabobhejani nokukhukhuthiswa kweempo ndo zabo zizuzisa idlanzana lee nqhema zemigulukudu. “Iinqhema zemigulukudu lezi ziphumelela bezizuze kilo mhlobo wobelelesi njengombana bunoburhiyarhiya obungakajayeleki nobunamaqhinga wezenzo zecwephetjhe eliphezulu.
Ngesikhathi iinqhema zemigulukudu zizuza kilokhu kuthika mezeka ihlelo likarhulumende lezehlalakuhle nelomnotho ngombana ubulelesobu obuhleliweko nokusebenza kweenqhema zemigulukudu haye buthuwelela emiphakathini nenarheni yoke,” kuqinisekisa umnyango.v Vikela Abobhejani BekhethuiseWULA AfriKA yenze imizamo eminengi yokubuyisa abobhejani abapheze batjha balala ngeminyaka ye-1960, kodwana ipilo yabobhejani isaragela phambili ngokuthuseleka njengombana gadesi babalelwa eenkulungwaneni ezimatjhumi amabili.

title: Ukutloliswa kwabavowudi kuyokwenzeka ngoNtaka wee-2018
author: More Matshediso
text:
IsiPhathiswa esiKhulu seza maKhetho u-Sy Mamabolo uveza bona iintetjhi zoku vowudela ezizii-22 612 zizoku vulwa ngepelaveke yamhlana ali-10 ukuya nakali-11 kuNtaka wee-2018 kusukela nge-iri lobunane ekuseni ukufikela ntambamba nge-iri lesihlanu. Lokho kwenzelelwa bona kube lula kubavowudi ukuqalisisa imininingwanabo nokutlolisa. Nayibe ufudukile endaweni ebewuhlala kiyo nawutlolisa kokuthoma erhelweni labavowudi, njenganje kufanele utlolise ngobutjha esiyingini salapho uyokuvowuda khona.
AmaSewula Afrika aneminyaka eli-18 ukuya phezulu abasele baneNcwadi kaMazisi nofana uMazisi oliKarada bangazi tlolisela ukuvowuda. Angeze wavunyelwa ukuvowuda ngomnyaka wee-2019 nayibe awukatlolisi.
Abazokutlolisela ukuvowuda ngelangelo kufanele baqale bonyana iimphande zabo zilungile erhelweni labavowudi kanti godu banikele ngelwazi elifaneleke ngesikhathi soku tloliswa.
 “Sifuna abavowudi balisebe nzise ithubeli beze ngobunengi babo,” kutjho u-Mamabolo.
“I-IEC bekube gadesi ayinazo iimphande zabavowudi abanga ba ziingidi ezi-2.8. Uhlathulule nokobana kuneemphande eziziingidi ezi-3.5 ezivezwe njengalezo ezingakapheleli. Ubujamobu butlhoga ukuhlazi-ywa okungeneleleko khona kuzakuvela imininingwana ethlayelako le,” Ikomitjhini isebenzise imi thombo ehlukahlukeneko efa ka hlangana ukubuyekezwa kwamarekhodi, amafayela wakade ukuqalisisa nokufaka iimphande zabavowudi abazitlolisa eminyakeni ematjhu mi amabili edlulileko. Ezinye iimphande bazifunyene erhe lweni labavowudi lamakhetho wabomasipala womnyaka wee-2016 begodu nejimeni lokwenza umsebenzi woku tlolisa abavowudi ngokungena umuzi nomuzi ngaphambi kwesikhathi nangepelaveke yokutloliselwa kwabavowudi amakhetho wokukhibelela.
Lapha kukghonakalako, abavowudi abafunyenwe ba tloliswe eeyingini ezingasizo zabo batjhidiselwa kezifane leko ngokwesiGaba12 (1)(d) somThetho wezamaKhetho.
“Semukele besasebenzisa ilwazimininingwana leempha nde  lemithombo yezakhiwo zikarhulumende ezinjengeZiko leemBalobalo zeSewula Afrika (i-StatsSA), i-Ejensi yeeMbonelelo zeSondlo noMhlalaphasi kaRhulumende yeSewula  Afrika, i-Telkom, I-Ofisi yemiSe benzi yePoso yeSewula Afrika nomNyango wezangeKhaya,” kutjho u-Mamabolo.

title: I-MISA Sisekelo Sepumelelo Yomplanimadorobha
author: More Matshediso
text:
U-Mukhodiwa, obuya esabelweni se-Luheni ngapha si koMasipala weNdawo i-Thulamela eseLimpopo, wafumana iZiqu ze-Urban and Regional Planning eYunivesithi ye-Venda ngomnya ka wee-2016.
Ungomunye wabazu zi ehlelweni lokuSeke lwa kweFundo yeLutjha ngaphasi kw-Ejensi eSekela umThangalasisekelo kaMasipala (i-MISA). Ihle lweli linqophe ukunikela abafundi abaneziqu ithuba lokufumana ilemuko lomsebenzi emikhakheni ebuthekhnikhali beba kghone ukutloliswa ee nhlanganweni zabasebenzi bamabizelo.
I-MISA iliphiko lika rhulumende welizweloke ngaphasi komNyango wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana. Umkhakha lo wahlonywa ngoMrhayili wee-2012.
“Ngemva kokuphasa uMethrigi ngomnyaka wee-2008, ngahlala umnyaka woke ngi cabanga bonyana ngizoku bhadela ngani iindle ko zeyunivesithi,”kwatjho u-Mukhodiwa.
Ngomnyaka wee-2010, wa tlolisa eYunivesithi ye Jwanasbhege, ngetjhudu elimbi ukutlhayela kweemali khange kumvumele uko bana aqede ngitjho nee mfundo zomnyaka wakhe wokuthoma, ngenca yalo kho walisa.
Ngomnyaka olandelako, watlolisela iimfundo ze-Ele ctrical Engineering N3 e kholiji yangekhabo ko dwana wabona bonyana leziimfundo azikhambe-lani nebhudango lakhe. Wathoma phasi godu,  wathumela iimbawo zokwa mukelwa emayunivesithi ngethemba lokufumana isizo leemali zokufunda.
Ngetjhudu, iYunivesithi ye-Venda yamukela isibawo sakhe  wabe wathoma ukufundela iziqu ze-Urban and Regional Planning ngomnyaka wee-2012.
Wathi, “isiKhwama seli Zweloke seSizo leeMali zokuFunda (i-NSFAS) sa bhadela iindleko zokufu nda zomnyaka wami wo kuthoma, i-MISA yange na ngomfundalize nasele emnyakeni wesibili yangi sekela bengaqeda iimfu ndo zami ngomnyaka wee-2016”.
Umfundalize lo wabhadela zoke iindleko zakhe, ezifaka hlangana iimali zokufunda, ukuthengwa kweencwadi, i ndawo yokuhlala nokugoma. Ngomnyaka wee-2017 u-Mukhodiwa wathoma iba ndulolemuko lomsebe nzi kwaMasipala weNdawo i-Prince Albert ngaphasi kwezemiSebenzi yomNya ngo neZenzelwa zomPha kathi.
“Lihlala likhona ithuba lokufikelela okufunako epi lweni, indabakulu kubekeze la. Kufanele wenze koke oku semandlenakho ukobana utjhugulule ubujamo ba kho bewuthuthukise ipilwa kho,” kwatjho u-Mukhodi wa.
Ihlelo lokuSekelwa kwe Fundo yeLutjha ngapha si kwe-Ejensi eSekela  umThangalasisekelo kaMasipala njenganje linabafu ndi abama-70 esele bathwe swe iziqu, hlangana nabo abaplani bemakho yeeyingi neyamadorobha bama-31, abosonjiniyera begezi bama24, abali-12 ngabaneziqu ze-Civil Engineering kuthi bathathu kube baphathi kezokwakha nakumaphroje kthi. Boke baqatjhwe boma sipala eemfundeni zolithoba njengengcenye yalelihlelo.
UmJaphethe womPhathi oyiHloko kwa-MISA  uNtandazo Vimba uthe  i-ofisakhe izwisisa isidi ngo esiqakathekileko  samakghonofundwa wa bosonjiniyera newezazi ke zokwakha eSewula Afrika.
UVimba uthe, “Asifuni kwaphela abantu abatjha abaneziqu kilemikhakha, kodwana kufanele siqinise kise bonyana baneba ndulo elamukelekako  ngokwezinga leentjhaba tjhaba begodu batloli swe neenhlangano eze ngamele ibizelo labo”.
Wangezelela ngokuthi, “Abomasipala bethu batlho ga khulu abantu abafundele amakghono. Sinomsebenzi omkhulu wokutjhugulula urhulumende weendawo zemakhaya ukuthi asebenze ngefanelo ngemizamo yethu yokuthuthukisa amakgho no”. 


Ababelethi Bazokubonakala Emakhethweni We-SGB

ABABElEthI BANEthuBA lokubamba indima ebonakalako ekulawulweni kweenkolo ngomnqopho wokuthuthukisa amazinga nokwenza iinkolo zibe yindawo engcono yabentwana.


Amakhetho we miKhandlu e Lawula iinKolo (ama-SGB) azokubanjwa ngoNtaka nonyaka, ka nti ababelethi bayakhu thazwa ukuzibandaka nya khona bazokufaka isandla ngokubonakala ko efundweni yabentaba bo.
Amakhetho azokuba njwa kizo zoke iinkolo zombuso elizweni mazombe.
UNgqongqotjhe weze Fundo esiSekelo u-Angie Motshekga uthe ama khetho la angamakhu lu ngelizweni kunga sabalwa amakhetho  waborhulumende bemakhaya newelizwe  loke.
“Amakhetho wama-SGB asiza ngokungezelela amazizo womphakathi ekubeni nelizwi eku-lawulweni kweenkolo. Ukusebenza kweenkolo kuyathuthuka lokha ababelethi bafaka isandla  ngokubonakalako ee ndabeni zesikolo.” Uthe amabhodi alawula iinkolo anendima ekulu ekulinganiseni amakareko wababambindima ngomnqopho wokusekela inembombono efanako yokufikelela imiphumela yefundo emihle nekhambi sana needingo zompha kathi nokuthuthukiswa kezomnotho.
Ama-SGB ajamele yoke imikhakha yomphakathi ozombeleze iinkolo, kufaka hlangana ababelethi, abotitjhere, abasebenzi besikolweni abangasibo abotitjhere nabafundi.
Isikhathi se-ofisi sokuphatha kwamalunga weSGB minyaka emithathu.Igunya lokulawula iinkolo UmThetho oLawula  iinKolo weSewula Afrika unikela ama-SGB amagu nya aneleko wokulawula iinkolo. Lokhu kukha mbisana nokuhloni tjhwa okuqakathekileko kwamaziko asekela inta ndo yenengi.Ngokuzibandaka nya emakhethweni wa ma-SGB, ababelethi  baqinisekisa bonyana iindingo zabentababo eenkolweni ziyatjhejwa.
Nanyana kungadingeki bonyana ababelethi abafu na ukuba malunga we-SGB babe neziqu zefundo, ababelethi abanamakghono wokulondwa kwemi niningwana, ukuhlolwa kweencwadi zeemali ne lwazi lezomthetho  abanekareko, begodu banetjisakalo ekuthuthukisweni kweze fundo, bayakhuthazwa ukobana bangenele ama khetho njengabongikhe thani.

title: Ingoma yesiTjhaba, iflarha, abonongorwana belizweloke, itshwayo lombuso namanye amatshwayo zizinto ekugidingwa ngazo ukuhlukahlukana.
author: vukuzenzele unnamed
text:
Mhlana ama-27 kuSihlaba ntakana we-1994 iSewula Afrika yaba namakhetho wokuthoma wentando yenengi angabandlululi ngokombala. Urhulumende omutjha wakhethwa ngaphasi koburholi behloko leya uMengameli uNelson Mandela. Kunengi esele kufikelelweko eminyakeni edlulileko, kwaphela kusese kunengi ekusafuze kwenziwe ukwenzela bona kuthuthukiswe ilizwe lekhethu bekwenziwe ngcono amaphilo wamaSewula Afrika woke.
 USihlabantakana lo akasiyi nyanga yokuqala kwaphela bona sibuya kude kangangani sililizwe, kodwana kusikhathi lapho iSewula Afrika igidinga khona iinkutana neenkutanakazi ngaboNongorwna beli Zweloke. Laba bonongorwana bezinga eliphezulu lapho ili zwe, ngesandla sikaMengameli, lithokoza izakhamuzi nabosaziwako bamanye amazwe.  UmThethosisekelo weSewula Afrika UmThethosisekelo watlanywa ngokweSigaba sesi-5 somThetho-sisekelo wesikhatjhana (umThetho Nomboro 200 womNyaka we-1993) bewamukelwa kokuthoma liBandla lokuTlanywa komThe thosisekelo mhlana abu-8 ku Mrhayili we-1996. Watlikitlwa bona ube mthetho mhlana ali-10 kuNobayeni we-1996.  Amatshwayo Welizwe Lethu ISewula Afrika ihlukile kamanye amazwe kangangokuthi sigidinga ukuhlukahlukana kwethu ngamaTshwayo welizwe ngeFlarha yelizwe, ngeNgoma yesiTjhaba yeSewula Afrika kunye nange Tshwayo lomBuso.
IFlarha yeSewula Afrika ihlukile.
Yatlanywa nguFred Brownell owayesebenzela i-State Herald yeSewula Afrika, begodu yathoma ukusetjenziswa mhlana ama-27 kuSihlabantakana we-1994.
Imibala yeflarha ayinikeli ihlathululo ekhethekileko ngalokho-ke akunalitho nanyana itshwayo ekumele lithathwe njengehlathululo yemibala yeflarha yelizwe lekhethu. U ‘V’ eflarheni utshwaya ukuhla ngana kwabantu abahlukahlukene ko beSewula Afrika nokuthatha indlela eragela phambili sisoke sibumbene.
Ukuphatjhiswa KweflarhaIFlarha nayijanyiswe thwi malu ngana neboda, umbala obomvu kufanele ube ngesinceleni somuntu oyiqalileko bese umphetho ekufakwa kiwo isigodo kufanele ube ngaphezulu. Nayibekwe yavundla, umphetho ekufakwa kiwo isigodo kufanele ube ngesinceleni somuntu oyiqalileko bese umbala obomvu uba ngaphezulu. Lokha iflarha ijanyiswe hlanu namkha ngemva kwesikhulumi emhlanganweni, kufanele ibe ngesigomeni sesikhulu mi. Nangabe ibekwe kenye indawo endaweni yomhlangano, kufanele ibe ngesigomeni sababukeli na mkha abalaleli bomhlangano.
ITshwayo lomBuso leliZwe ITshwayo lomBuso leSewula Afrika, elibuye laziwe ngokuthi litshwayo eliqakathekileko lelizwe lekhethu, lilitshwayo elikhulu nelingaphezulu kwawo woke elizweni.  ITshwayo lomBuso liyingcenye yesiTembu somBuso. Umtlolo onomgadangiso wesiTembu somBuso utjho igunya eliphezulu njengombana ungophasiswe nguMengameli weSewula Afrika. ITshwayo lomBuso leSewula Afrika lahlonywa ngeLanga leTjhaphuluko ngomnyaka wee-2000. Amatshwayo wayo ahleleke ngendlela yokuthi aveza inzinzo, ukuhlonipha nokuqakatheka kwalo.
Isiqubulo seTshwayo lomBuso sithi: “!ke e: /xarra //ke” esitlolwe ngelimi le-Khoisan, esitjho ukuthi abantu abahlukahlukeneko ababumbeneko.
INgoma yesiTjhaba  INgoma yesiTjhaba yelizwe le khethu ikhethekile njengombana ivunywa ngamalimi amane.
INgoma yesiTjhaba yethulwa ngomnyaka we-1997. Itlanywe ngokusebenzisa iingcenye ezithi leko zeengoma ezimbili zesitjhaba (‘i-Nkosi Sikelel’ iAfrika’ ne‘The Call of South Africa’/’Die Stem van Suid-Afrika’); ezazivunywa hlangana komnyaka we-1994 newe-1997. Amatshwayo welizwe lekhethu angalendlela elandelako:
•	Inyamazana	yeliZwe,	itsephe
•	 Ithuthumbo	leliZwe,	isiqalaba
•	 IsiHlahla	seliZwe,	umkhoba
•	 INyoni	yeliZwe,	udoyi
•	 IHlambi	yeliZwe,	igaljoen

title: I-App Yenza ngcono zokuthutha e-Gauteng
author: vukuzenzele unnamed
text:
I-Gauteng on the Move  izokuphelisa ukuzaza okubangelwa ziinthuthi zomphakathi ngombana inikela abakhweli ilwazi elinqophileko ngeenkhathi zokukhamba kweenthuthi nemali ebhadelwako  ye-Gautrain‚ i-Metrobus‚ i-A Re Yeng‚ i-Rea Vaya‚ i-Me trorail‚ iimBhesi ze-Gautrain‚ i-Johannesburg City Sight seeing Bus (ekuyibhesi yokubukela iindawo), iimB hesi ze-Tshwane nebubulo lamateksi.
Nagade akhuluma  mhlapha emnyanyeni wokuhloywa kwe-App le ema-ofisini wabatlami bayo e-Midrand, uSomkhandlu wezokuThutha e-Gauteng, u-Ismail Vadi uthe umnya ngo ubone isidingo sokuse tjenziswa kwethekhnoloji ehle nehlelo leenthuthi elithuthukileko ngomnqo pho wokuthuthukisa ihlelo leenthuthi.
“URhulumende wesi Funda se-Gauteng unikele ngesikhathi, amano nee nsetjenziswa ekuthuthuki sweni kwalelihlelo elisiza abakhweli ukuhlela lula amakhambabo ngemihlobo yeenthuthi ehlukahlukeneko kilesisifunda. Ubeke wathi, "Sibona amandla wamano wethekhnoloji akha kabu tjha iinthuthi zomphakathi.
Asingabazi bonyana ama tjhuguluko wethekhnoloji ephasini atjhugulula umkha kha wezeenthuthi. Kufuze sizijayeze amatjhuguluko la besikhambisane nawo”.
U-Vadi uqinisekise bo nyana isifunda sizakura ga nokusebenzisa amano wezerhubhululo netuthuko ngomnqopho wokwenza ngcono ukusebenza kuhle nokufikeleleka kweenthuthi.
Nasele idawunilowudiwe i-App le izakusiza abase benzisi bayo ukuhlela amakhambabo ngokukhe tha umhlobo wesithuthi abasitlhogako, iinkhathi zokukhamba nokhunye aba kutlhogako njengekhambo elifitjhani nanyana elitjhi phileko.
Umfundi nomkhweli weenthuthi zomphakathi eJwanasbhege u-Glen Dlamini uthe i-App le izo kwethula iinkulungwana ngeenkulungwana zaba khweli umthwalo.
“I-App le imkarisomraro.
Iliqhinga likarhulumende eliletha amatjhuguluko, khulukhulu kulutjha elifa na nami ngisuka e-Soweto ngtjhinge eYunivesithi yeJwanasbhege enge-Auck land Park qobe lilanga.
“Gadesi ngikghona uku hlela amakhambo wami ngcono ngokwemali engi nayo bengenze isilinganiso seenkhathi zokukhamba.
“I-App le imkarisomraro, ilisizo khulu emuntwini onjengami ongasiso isakha muzi sesifundenesi, njengo mbana kuzokuba lula kimi ukuya eendaweni ezi hlukahlukeneko,” kwatjho u-Khanyo Malunga, nagade akhuluma ne-Vuk’uzenzele  e-Blairgowrie.
Wangezelela ngokuthi, “Nangize lapha nje ngizoku hlungelwa umsebenzi, ngizokukghona ukuhlela ngcono ikhambo lami bengi zijayeze indawo”.
I-App le iyafumaneka ki bofunjathwako be-Android  nebe-iPhone, abafumaneka eentolo zama-App ezihlu kahlukeneko.

title: Ukukhandelwa Kwesomiso Esikhulu
author: vukuzenzele unnamed
text:
Isomiso sikhathi eside khulu sokungani kwezulu okubangela ukutlhayelelwa mamanzi.
Ngokutjho kukaDorh. Mathieu Roualt, omsizi kaphrofesa emNyangweni weemFundo eziPhathelene nezamaLwandle (i-Oceonography) eYunivesithi yeKapa, unobangela omkhulu wesomiso mithelela yeEl Niño nokutjhugutjhuguluka kobuja mo bezulu nanyana itlayimethi.
Wathi “I-El Niño  sisehlakalo semvelo esibuyelela njalo ngem va kweminyaka emithathu uku ya kemihlanu godu ubujamobu bungathatha iminyaka emibili.
Bandisa umtjhiso emalwandle we-Pacific ne-Indian, okunga bangela ubujamo besomiso”.
Ukutjhugutjhuguluka kwe tlayimethi kuhlathululwa nje ngamatjhuguluko wama  phetheni wetlayimethi  yephasi zombelele okwa thoma phakathi ukuya  ngekupheleni komnya kakhulu nanyana isentjhuri yama-20 godu kungunobangela wokukhula kwamazinga wo mmoya osilaphazekileko emka yini (ikhaboni dayioksa yidi) okhiqizwa kusetjenziswa kwerhasi yemvelo.
UDorh. Roualt wahlathulula ngokuthi “Isentjhuri edluli leko le i-Afrika engeSewula itlhage khulu ngamatjhugu tjhuguluko wetlayimethi waqobe mnyakaokwabangela isomiso esirhageleko nokupha zamiseka kwepilo yeemila neentjalo zequlwanini nezema nzini nepilo yabantu ngo kwabo. Amatjhuguluko la abanomthelela ebubulweni lezokulima, amadamu nem nothweni wezokuthiya nemno thweni ngokuphele leko. Godu amatjhuguluko la athikameza nokugeleza kwemi lanjana nezakhipilo zeentjalo ezitjhinga elwandle,”.
Imithelela leiliduma elin gophiko phezu kweSewula Afrika khulukhulu ngombana ilizwe lekhethu linendlala ye zulu elingaba mamililitha ama450 (ml) nalimadaniswa nezulu elina ephasini elimamililitha ama-860.
Iyini Imithelela Yesomiso?Ngenyanga kaMhlolanja umN yango wezokuBusa ngokuBa mbisana nezeNdabuko (i-Cogta) utjhugulule izinga lobujamo besomisa ukusuka ekubeni yihlekelele yesifunda ukuya ekubeni yihlekelele yeli zweloke.
UDorh. Mmaphaka Tau, oyi hloko yeZiko lokuLawulwa kweHlekelele leliZweloke (NDMC) uthe “ngemva kokuhlahluba kabutjha ubu jamo oburhagalako besomiso eemfundeni eentathu, iim phathimandla zezehlekelele zibuyekeze ubujamo besomiso bamenyezelwa njengehlekelele yelizweloke”.  Nanyana kubudisi nje ukuli nganisa imithelela yesomiso kezomnotho, kodwana kube nomthelela omumbi omkhulu emkhakheni wezokulima. Nge Tjingalanga Kapa, esebujameni besibili ngelizweni ngengeniso yomKhiqizo wangeKhaya oPhe leleko (i-GDP) kezokulima, ku lahleke imisebenzi epheze ibe zii-21 000 ekoteni yesithathu nyakenye. Umkhiqizo wekoroyi  wehle ngama-47% ngomnyaka wee-2017 begodu kunekgho nakalo yokutlhayela kwewayini ngamalitha aziingidi ezima-90  ezakuthunyelwa emazweni wangaphandle nethengiswa ngelizweni lekhethu.  Ukutlhayela kwamanzi ku zakuba nomthelela omumbi  omkhulu nekukhanjisweni kwendle nanyana ekuhlwe ngiseni, emkhakheni wetjhejo lezamaphilo newezokuvaka tjha.
Khuyini Okwenziwako Ukuqalana Nobujamobu?Abomasipala abasahlelwe siso miso bamemezele imithetho eqinileko yokonga amanzi ngokomkhawulo othileko efanele ilandelwe zizakhamuzi nebamabhizinisi.
Amaziko wokuhlanza amanzi welwandle ukobana alungele ukusetjenziswa mphakathi, amahlelo wokulungisa  amaphayiphi, ukusetjenziswa kwamanzi kwehlandla lesibili nokwenjiwa kweempetsi za manzi kumagadango aqalele lweko bona azakuba yipengu njengombana amaphrojekthi la sele aya ngekupheleni.

title: Ilutjha lithokoza amathuba womsebenzi wehlelo i-YESU
author: vukuzenzele unnamed
text:
Ngetjhudu-ke nokho ngahla ngana ne-Lulaway Recruit -ment Agency, esebenzisana ne-YES, bangipha ithuba loko bana ngifunde umsebenzi ngo kwenza, elaziwa nge-Intern ship.” I-YES iligadango elihlanga nyelwe ngurhulumende, u mkhakha wezabasebenzi  kunye newamabhizinisi ngo mnqopho wokuvulela isigidi selutjha leSewula Afrika ithu ba lokufundiswa umsebenzi libe lisebenza, elizakuthatha iminyaka emithathu ezako le.  Irhubhululo elenziwe babe lani litjengisa ukuthi ilemuko lomsebenzi lomnyaka munye ku-CV , eliphekelelwa yincwa di efakazela ilemuko lomse benzi, landisa ithuba lomuntu omutjha lokuthola umsebenzi ngokubuyelelwe kathathu.  U-Temane ungezelela ngo kuthi uyawuthanda umse benzakhe, khulu khulu ngoba umenza ukuthi asize abanye abantu abatjha ukuthola u msebenzi, njengombana ase benza ezikweni lokuqatjha abantu abatjha abazokufunda umsebenzi babe barholarhola.
Nakuvulwa iHlelo i-YES, uMengameli u-Ramapho sa wethulwe esiqhemeni sokuthoma se-100 lelutjha elizakuqatjhwa ngaphasi kwehlelweli ebhanga i-ABSA, i-Investec, i-Netcare, i-Sasol kunye ne-Unilever.
“Igadangweli silibona  njengalelo eliyisika ebanzi nepheleleko yomzamo weli zwe loke wokuvulela abantu abatjha amathuba. Enye isika eqakathekileko kufundiswa nokuthuthukiswa kwama kghonofundwa wabantu  abatjha,” kutjho uMengameli u-Ramaphosa.  Ukhombele amabhizinisi amancani ukuthi alime yawo indima njengoba anesisekelo esibanzi sokuqatjha nje, wabe wathi amabhizinisi amakhu lu awodwa angeze akghona ukuqatjha ilutjha ngokwane leko.
Ngokutjho kuka-CEO we-YES u-Tashmia Ismail-Saville, ebantwini abaziingidi ezi li-15.5 beminyaka ehlangana kweli-18 nama-34 beSewula Afrika, abaziingidi ezi-5.8 babo ngabangasebenziko.  “I-YES inqophe ukunikela leyongcenye yelutjha lekhe thu, eleqiswa amehlo mahle lo wagadesi wokuqatjha, ithuba eliqakathekileko loku thoma lokufumana ilemuko lomsebenzi elirholelwako,” kutjho u-Ishmael-Saville.
Njengehlohlomezelo esinge zelelo emabhizinisini ama ncani, lawo aqatjhe ilutjha labantu abanzima elihlanga na neminyaka eli-18 nema29, azakulungela ukuthola iHlohlomezelo Yomthelo Wokuqatjha iLutjha enga nge-R1 000 ngenyanga.  Abantu abatjha abalungele ukusizakala ngeHlelo le-YES kufanele:

 • babe hlangana kwemi nyaka eli-18 nema-34.
 • babe babantu ebebanga sebenzi isikhathi esinga phezulu kweenyanga ezisithandathu. • babe babantu beSewula Afrika ( abaNzima, ama Khaladi namaNdiya);
  Iinkampani ezifisa ukubi za iHlohlomezelo Yomthelo Wokuqatjha iLutjha, kufanele ibe ziqatjhe ilutjha leminyaka ehlangana kwe-18 nama-29.
  Kufanele lirhole malini ilutjha? Umrholo walo kulindeleke uku thi ube sesilinganisweni sobu ncani bomrholo obuzii-R3 500 ngenyanga, esibala hlangana nawo namahlelo wokufundi swa umsebenzi nokusekela labo abazabe bafundiswa umsebe nzi. Iindleko zalokhu zibalelwa eenkulungwaneni ezima-R55 zamaranda ngomnyaka.

title: Kunekghonakalo Yokungezelelwa Kwamalimi Asemthethweni eSewula Afrika
author: Neo Semono
text:
UMengameli u-Cyril Rama phosa wenze isimemezelwesi nabekugcotjwa ngokwesigi yani iNdlovukazi ya-Ba lobedu eBaleni lezemiDlalo i-Mokwakwaila e-Bolobedu, Ga-Modjadji, e-Limpopo.

 I-Khelobedu lilimi elikhu lunywa sitjhaba sa-Balobedu, esizakubuswa yiNdlovukazi yeZulu ya-Balobedu ene minyaka eli-13 njenganje, nayiqeda ukugcotjelwa le sisikhundla sokuba yiNdlo vukazi u-Modjadji VII nayi hlanganisa iminyaka eli-18.
 Nakagcotjelwa isikhundlesi uzabe sele aqede ukukhuliswa  ngokwesiko la-Balobedu.“Leli-ke ligadango lama mbala lendima ehle yomla ndo uMma u-Winnie Madi kizela-Mandela abeka zazikhakhazisa ngalo. Lobu kuphela kobukhosi be Ndlovukazi obukhona eSe wula Afrika ne-Afrika jikele le,” kutjho u-Ramaphosa.
UMengameli u-Ramapho sa ukhulume waqinisele la ukuzibophelela kwaka rhulumende ekubuyiseni ukuhlonipheka nesithunzi sobukhosi babantu abanzima. UBukhosi ba-Balobedu bubuyiswe ngokusemthe thweni ngenyanga kaNtaka wee-2016, ngemva kwerhu bhululo elenziwa yiKomi tjhini YomBango WoBukho si (i-CTLDC) ngobujamo ba-Balobedu, njengobana kwakunombango bekwafa kwa isibawo serhubhululo kiyo i-CTLDC.
“URhulumende uzibo phelele ukuyiphumele lisa nokuyipha amandla  imibandela yeSahluko se12 somThethosisekelo,  khulu khulu ukubuyiswa kwesithunzi sobukhosi ba bantu ehlelweni lokuBuswa ngeNtando yeNengi,” kutjho uMengameli u-Ramaphosa.
UMengameli u-Ramaphosa uthe ukuhlonitjhwa kobu khosi beNdlovukazi namkha bomuntu omsikazi eSewula Afrika kutjengisa ukuzibo phelela ngekambisolawulo namandla wokulinganiswa kobulili, ukube ngahlanye kuhlonitjhwa nendima  yoburholi elinywa babantu abasikazi kiwo woke ama koro wepilo.  “Amakhosi anomsebenzi oqakatheke khulu ekufuze awenze ekwakheni umpha kathi onganamtlhago, onga nakutlhogeka komsebe nzi nongatjhiyani ngendima yepilo. Amakhosi wekhethu kufuze akhambe phambili emzabalazweni wokubuyisa ukuhlonitjhwa kwamalunge lo nesithunzi sabantu bekhe thu.”

 Ubuye wagandelela nokuqa katheka kwendima elinywa  makhosi ekubuyiseleni aba ntu iindawo namkha iinarha zabo.
“Kufanele benze isiqinise ko sokuthi inarha ibuyiselwa kilabo abayisebenzako, babe benze nesiqiniseko sokuthi nalabo ababuyiselwa inarha banawo amandla, iimfanelo kunye nelwazi lokuyisebenza inarha leyo,” kutjho uMenga meli u-Ramaphosa.
Balinganiselwa ema-25 we engidi abantu abahlala  eendaweni zemakhaya aba khele namkha abahlala ngaphasi  kwelawulo lama khosi.

Uthi Bewusazi Nje?
• A-Balobedu behlelwa liliwa elimbi ngomnyaka we-1972 mhlazana iNdlovukazi yeZulu yangesikhatheso u-Makoma Modjadji emukwa amandla wobukhosi bakhe, wehliselwa esikhundleni sokuba mdosiphambili wesiqhenyana namkha induna yesiqhenyana sabantu. 
• Iindawo neenduna ezingaphasi kwesandla sakhe zafakwa ngaphasi kwesabelo se-Lebowa nese-Gazankulu, ngaleyindlela-ke kwabulawa amasiko anothileko namafa wesiko la-Balobedu elineminyaka engaphezulu kwama-400.

title: UmNyango WezangeKhaya Ulwisana Nemijeje EmideAMASEWULA AFRIKA azokukghona ukufumana isizo elinqophileko nelamsinya  ema-ofisini womNyango wezangeKhaya.
author: More Matshediso
text:
NgokukaNgqongqotjhe  wezangeKhaya uMalusi Gi gaba imijeje emide ibangelwe bunengi babantu, ukutlhayela kwendawo yokulinda nge ma-ofisini, iintjhijilo ngoburholi obungazikhandliko nokungase benzi kwama-ofisi womnyango lo ngeMigqibelo.
Njengendlela yokulungisa umraro lo, umnyango uqalisisa ibalazwe ngomqopho wokuye lela ukusatjalaliswa kwama-ofisi wawo khona kuzakutjhejwa iindawana ezitlhoga ukulungi swa  kukhutjhulwe nezinga lokusebenza.
UNgqongqotjhe uqinisekise ngokuthi, “Sizokuhloma ihlolomazizo lamakhastama, silungise iziko lezokuthintana namakhastama ukobana lise benze ngokuzeleko, sifumane ipengu ngamakhastama afika nanyana kunini, ukwelulwa kweendawo zokulinda ema-ofi sini, ukwethulwa kwekambiso yokusebenza ngamadlhego kwabasebenzi , ukutjheja irherho elingasebenzi ngefanelo, kukhuthazwe amavakatjho wa bhalakada wabaphathi abaphe zulu, kuthuthukiswe  uku khamba komsebenzi ngefanelo nokwenza ngcono zokuthintana namakhastama”.
Lamahlelo wokusebenza azokusatjalaliswa njengeendle la zokungenelela zesikhatjhana, zesikhathi esiphakathi nezesikhathi eside.
UNgqongqotjhe uhlathulule wathi iintjhijilwezi angeze zara rululwa ngepengu yamsinyana, ngalokho wakhombela nompha kathi ukubekezela lokha umnya ngo nawusethula amahlelo la.
UNgqongqotjhe uGigaba uthe, “Sihlala sizibophelele ukwenza ngcono ekulwisaneni nemijeje nanyana kuneenqabo nezinye iintjhijilo nje”.
Ngaphambi kokumenyezelwa kwemiTlamo yokwEnza, umnya ngo wethule umbiko wokuhlola ngomnqopho wokufuna indle la engcono yokulawula imijeje nokukhuphula izinga lokuse benza.
Umbiko lo ubale amarherho  angakanzinzi, iindlela zoku sebenza ezingakalungi  namaqhinga wezokuthintana angakalungelelaniswa ekuzi zinto ezibangele ukunganelise ki kwamakhastama nemijeje emide.
NgokukaNgqongqotjhe, ama phuzu alandelako athuwelelise umraro:
■ Ukubhalelwa kulawu -la kwabaphathi kamanye ama-ofisi 
■ Ukunganikelwa kwabase benzi inani lemisebenzi ela nelisako 
■ Ukutlhayela kwehlelo lokwe nzela amakhastama isibeki selwano sesikhathi
■ Ukungalawulwa kuhle kwemijeje 
■ Ukusetjenziswa kanyekanye kwamahlelo wokutlola phasi newemitjhiningqondo yesi manjemanje 
• Ukungasatjalaliswa kwa ma-ofisi ngokutjheja iindingo • Izwangobatjho emamala yokupheliswa kwabomazisi abalihlaza abanebhakhowudi.
• Ukutlhayela kwamatshwayo ayikomba ema-ofisini.

Kunama-ofisi womnyango wezangekhaya ali-184 asebenzi sa amarherho wemitjhiningqo ndo yesimanjemanje neenkghu dlhwana zokusebenzela ezi ma-411 ngelizweni mazombe.
Ma-ofisi ali-184 kwaphela ekungiwo asebenza ngeembawo nokulandwa kwamakarada wabomazisi namaphasipoti.
Umnyango uvuselela abo makhambangendlwana  abama-78 begodu uthemba bonyana bazakusatjalaliswa ngeSewula Afrika mazombe esiquntwini sesibili somnyaka wee-2018 .

UTHIBEWUSAZINJE?
Selokhu kwasatjalaliswa kokuthoma aboMazisi abamaKarada  ngomnyaka wee-2013, ama-ofisi womNyango wezangeKhaya sele akhuphe aboMazisi abamaKarada abangaphezulu kweengidi ezilithoba.

title: Kumsebenzi weSewula Afrika ukufundisa ilutjha
author: More Matshediso
text:
UNgqongqotjhe u-Pandor uthe kumSebenzi welizwe ukusekela imindeni etlhagako nedobha phasi.
Begade akhuluma emhla nganweni weembikiindaba lapho aveze khona ikambiso ezokulandelwa nakusatjalali swa ifundo ephakemeko yasi-mahla ngeSewula Afrika.
UNgqongqotjhe u-Pandor umemezele bona urhulumende usise ngokungezelela ngamabhiliyoni ali-R7.166 ukusekela imifundalize ezakunikelwa abentwana abaphuma emindenini edobha phasi nenababelethi abangarholi kokuyaphi abathomako emayunivesithi nema-TVET kilomnyaka.
UNgqongqotjhe u-Pandor uqinisekise bona amabhiliyoni ama-R4.581 abekelwe abafundi beyunivesithi abalungelweko namabhiliyoni ama-R2.585 wabafundi bemakholiji weTVET.
Ngomnyaka wee-2017 urhulumende wamemezela bona ifundo ephakemeko izakuba ngeyasimahla ebafundini abadobha phasi nalabo ababuya emindenini leyo ingenisohla nganyela yayo yaqobe mnyaka izii-R350 000.
Abafundi basekelwa ngaphasi kwehlelo lemifundalize elinatjisiweko, elijamiselela langaphambilini elalihla nganise ukubolekisa nokuni kela ngomfundalize onikelwa siKhwama seliZweloke seSizo leeMali zokuFunda (i-NSFAS).  “Isabiwosisekelo se-NSFAS sokusiza abafundi beyunivesithi nebema-TVET abado bha phasi nebemindeni enga rholi kokuyaphi sizokukhula ukusukela kumabhiliyoni ali-R9.849 ngomnyaka wee2017/18 ukufikela kumabhiliyoni ama-R35.321 ngomnyaka wee-2020/21.
UNgqongqotjhe uthe, “Lokhu kubiza isidingo sokukhuphula izinga lokwenza izinto ngcono kwe-NSFAS.  Singezelele ngeengidi ezili-R105 ngo kweTlhatlha leQhinga leeMali lesiKhathi esiPhakathi komNyaka (i-MTSF) ngomnqopho wokusiza i-NSFAS ukuqinisa ikghono layo lokulawula”.
Abafundi abalungelwe kufumana isizo, eminyakeni yokufunda ngokulandelana kwayo, abatlolisele isitifikedi selizwe loke (samakghono)  emakholiji we-TVET wombuso – bazakufumana ifundo yasimahla ngomfundalize weemali zesikolo neyeentlabagelo zokufunda.
Ukungezelelwa kwesekelo leemali lomnyaka wee-2018/19 kuzakusiza abafundi abazii nkulungwana ezima-458 875 ukobana bafumane imifunda lize.
 Abafundi bemakholiji wa-ma-TVET abalinganiselwa ee50 480 abanelisa iindingo zefuneko yezeenthuthi, yeendawo zokuhlala nokugoma, nabo bazakusekelwa, kanti abazii 82 600 bazakufumana isibonelelo seenthuthi.
UNgqongqotjhe uthe isabelomali esitjhesi silindeleke ukusekela okungasenani  iinkhala ezizii-83 200 kezizii 208 000 (ekuma-40%) zabafu ndi abathomako emayunivesithi ngomnyaka wee-2018.

title: Abogadi Bezemvelo Bavikela Abobhejani
author: Dale Hes
text:
“Indlu yakwethu inephahla elihle, elinganetheliko, lokhu kuyipumelelo eyenzeke  ngenca yokuthi ngiyasebenza.
Ngiyathokoza ngokufumana ithubeli,” utjho njalo.
UNgqongqotjhe wezeBhoduluko uDorh Edna Molewa uthiyelele abatjheji bona “bo gadi bezemvelo” ngombana babamba indima eqakathe-kileko ekulwisaneni nobulele si obukhinyabeza ibhoduluko, njengokuzunywa kwabobhe jani okungasisemthethweni.
“UmNnyaka ophelileko abatjheji bebhoduluko abayi1 659 bathunyelwa eendaweni ezidlange ngokuzunywa kwabobhejani okungasi  semthethweni ngomnqopho wokuyokukhandela ubulele sobu  nokuvikela ibhoduluko.
Bazokufundiswa bebanikelwe amandla wokuba bazenda bokuvikelwa kwebhoduluko kilomkhakha,” ubeke watjho.
UNyawo bekayingcenye yabasebenza esiqhemeni esabamba umzumi ongasisemthethweni e-Umkhuze Game Reserve, owathi ngemva kwalokho umzumi loyo wathweswa umlandu.
“Ngazikhakhazisa ngegale lo lami, begodu ukubotjhwa komzumi lo kwaphunyeleliswa lilwazi nelemuko lomse benzi ebegade nginalo,” ubeke watjho.
Ihlelweli libe momthelela omkhulu ekuphumeleliseni igadango lokubotjhwa,  ukuphenywa nekugwetjweni kwabazumi abangasisemthethweni; lehlisa izinga lokuzuma okungasi semthethweni ngama-50%; bela qinisekisa ukwehla kokuzu nywa kweenyamazana nga ma-76%.

title: Usoplasi wengubo uvune ipumelelo
author: Nonkululeko Mathebula
text:
U-Matlakane uhlala  Ga-Moisimane, ese-Bu chum ngaphandlanyana kwe-Polokwane, eLimpopo.
Uthi nanyana athabela iinthe lo zomsebenzakhe, kodwana bekungasilula esikhathini esinengi. “Sikhule kabudisi mina nabentwana bakwethu”.
Abangani bami bebangihleka nangithoma ukusebenza eplasini bathi umsebenzi weplasini ngewabantu abangakafundi. “Lokho bekungizwisa ubuhlungu kodwa na ngaqiniselela njengomba na bengifuna ukuthola ilwazi lokusebenza eplasini ukwenzela bona ngizokwazi uku -lisebenzisa njengebizelo,” ubeke watjho.
 U-Matlakane wathi anga kathola ilwazi wayokhulu misana nomphathi weplasi ebekasebenza kiyo ngokuzinikela u-Johan Nel mayela na nokutjala imbewu ya-khe nokukhulisa amagreen pepper .  U-Nel wamnikela amahagere amabili wenarha eplasini yakhe.
“Ngamangazwa kubona bona imbewu encani inga phenduka iintjalo ezinga-khiqiza amagreen pepper amakhulu kangaka. Ukubona bona iintjalo ziyatjhejwa ngokusebenzisa iimvundisi zeentjalo ukwenzela bona zingabi neenunwana kwangezelela thando lami lokulima. Lokhu kwenza bona ngazi khonokho  bona lokhu ngikho engifu na ukukwenza,” watjho njalo u-Matlakane.
Ngemva kokuqeda iBanga le-12 u-Matlakane wahlala umnyaka tomu angarageli phambi li ngeemfundo ije bekamukelwe eYunivesithi yeJwanasbhege bona ayofundela iziqu ze zomthetho.  Wabuyela emva ku-Nel uku yobawa isizo elinye lelwazi lokulima, u-Nel wamyeleli sa bona akakhulume neKosi yendawo yekhabo mayelana nokuthi kungakghonakala bona imuphe isiqetjhana senarha.  Ngemva kokubona ipumele lwakhe eplasini lika-Nel iKosi yendawo yamnikela amahagere ama-40 wenarha eplasini la-Babirwa Ba Tau Ya Tswala lapho khona njenganje arage la khona ibubulo lakhe. Uqatjhe abantu abatjha abane bona basebenze naye.
 Iplasi lika-Matlakane li sabalalisa igreen pepper  emmarageni zemirorho nee-nthelo ezinothil eko e-Buchum,  e-Polokwane neJwanisbhege.
Nanyana ibubulo lakhe linengeniso yee-R50 000 qobe nge nyanga, u-Matlakane uzimisele ukuzibona athengisela amazwe  wephasi loke.
U-Matlakane uthe ubona ingomuso lakhe lilihle begodu unomnqopho wokuphelisa umtlhago emalungeni wom phakathi ngokubanikela amakghono nomsebenzi njengo ba ibubulo lakhe liragelaphambili ngokukhula nje. Nanyana azange khekathole isizo kurhulumende, u-Matlakane unethemba ngengomuso elihle lakhe begodu uthe umnqophakhe omkhulu kuphelisa umtlhago ebantwini bem -phakathini wakhe ngokubani kela amafundokghono nomse benzi njengoba ibubulo lakhe likhula.

title: Ukuvutha Komlilo Kuvula Amathuba Wemisebenzi
author: Adele Schormann
text:
Liletha ithemba elutjheni elinengi elingatholi imisebenzi belisebenza kuhle khulu ekukhandeleni nekulawuleni imililo, lehlisa nemithelela emi mbi elethwa mililo yommango.
Ihlelweli liqatjhe abantu abangaphezulu kwee-5 000 abavela emiphakathini etlhagako belibabandule ngelwazi lokulawula imililo, ifundiso ngemililo, uku wukhandela nokuwuphelisa begodu namanye amakghono, afana nesizo lokuthoma, uku kapela, ukupheka, zamaphilo nokuphepha kunye nezokuthintana. Umsebenzi wezokuthintana we-WOF u-Lebogang Mase ko uhlathulule bona ihlelweli liqale khulu ilutjha nokuqatjha abantu abakhubazekileko bona basebenze ema-ofisini wabo asemfundeni. “Sikhuthaza khulu uku thuthukiswa kwamakghono nokunikela ngemisebenzi elutjheni elisanda ukuphuma esikolweni samabanga aphezulu namkha ebasandukuthola iziqu zabo emazikweni wefundo ephezulu. Ehlelweni lokuqa tjha, ama-94% lilutjha, ama31% babantu bengubo kuthi amaphesende amathathu kube babantu abakhubazekileko,” uqinisekise njalo.
U-Lorraine Mokoena one minyaka ema-31 weMpuma langa ungomunye wabaqatjhiweko nozuzileko kilelihle lo. Usebenze ku-WOF iminyaka eli-11 edlulileko.  Ngemva kokuqeda iBanga le-12 waba nobudisi bokuthola umsebenzi iminyaka emibili.
Udadwabo wamtjela ngehlelo le-WOF.
“Ikambiso yokufaka isibawo somsebenzi lo yayibudisi. Isimo somzimba namkha isithombo kuyinto eqakatheke khulu kilomsebenzi begodu abantu abasandukuqatjhwa babekwa ngokuya ngokwesithombo namkha ngokuqina kwa bo. Nawuqeda ukuphumele la ukuhlungwa kufuze godu uphumelele nokuhlolwa zam aphilo bese-ke ngemva kwalokho ukubandulelwa ukucima umli lo kuyathoma,” ubeke watjho.  U-Mokoena uthome uku sebenza njengomcimimlilo osathomako, wasebenza wabe wakhutjhulewa esikhundleni sokuba mndosiphambili omkhu lu wesiqhema, adosa phambili isiqhema sabacimimlilo aba li-18.  “Umsebenzi lo utjhugulule ipilwami. Ngimi ngendwa ose benzako ngakwethu ngondla abentwana bakwethu nabentwa na bami ababili. Ngiyakwazi ukondla umndenami bengibhadele neendleko zesikolo zabentwana bami,” uyatjho u-Mokoena.
Uyavuma bona umkhakha wezokucima umlilo kanengi kumsebenzi wabobaba begodu uthi ufunde bona kufanele aqine, azijamele njengomma kilomkhakha.  U-Mokoena uzilungiselela bona abe mphathi wezemise benzi kilomkhakha eminyakeni emibili ezako. Lokhu kuzome-nza umphathi weenqhema za ma-WOF zoke ezinzinze eMpu malanga.
Njengombana isikhathi semili lo sitjhidele nje, u-Mokoena unikele ngeeyeleliso ezilandelako zokuvikela imililo yemmango:  
• Ungatiki namkha unga kghwari umlilo emmangweni nangabe angekhe ukwazi ukuwulawula.  
• Qiniseka bona unesizo ela neleko kunye neentlabagelo zokujamelana nobunye ubu jamo obugalethwa mlilo.  
• Ungatjhiyi umlilo ungana mtjheji.
• Yelela ubujamo bezulu.
• Ukutikwa namkha ukukghwarwa komlilo emmangweni akukafaneli bona kwenziwe mhlana kutjhisa khulu na mkha kunommoya.

title: Umtjhayeli Weenkepe Wenza Imikariromraro
author: Allison Cooper
text:
UMdletshe wabelethelwa bewakhulela e-Port She pstone bese wafunda e-St Faiths.
“Ngaba nethuba loku funda nokubona okune ngi endaweni engakhulela kiyo. Kwakunganakwesa ba, kungafani nesikhathi sanamhlanjesi, umntwa na bekakhuliswa sitjhaba ngokuhlanganyela.”UMdletshe waphasa ume thrigi ngomnyaka wee-2006 ngaphambi kokudlulela e-Durban University of Technology ukuyokufunde la iDiploma  yeemFundo zeLwandle iNational Diplo ma in Maritime Studies  ngo mnyaka wee2007 Ngemva kokuqeda ii mfundo zakhe zeS1 ngo mnyaka wee-2007 nezeS2 ngomnyaka wee-2008,  wathoma ibandulo lemi nyaka emithathu elwandle ngaphasi kwekhamphani i-Safmarine Shipping Co mpany. Lapha wafunda amakghono wokulawula isikepe esilayitjha ipahla nokujama emadoyelweni ahlukahlukeneko, leYuro bhu, we-Afrika ne-Asia lapho gade abandulelwa ukutjhejwa kwemithwalo nezokuphepha.
Wafumana idigri yakhe yokuthoma aneminyaka ema-25, kanti ngakelinye i hlangothi bekaqedelela i-Master’s  kuPort Opera tions . Idigri yesibili le yamenza waba yingorho mtjhayeli weenkepe ophe leleko. “Lokhu kwaba yise lele ekulu ngombana ukuba mtjhayeliinkepe akutlhogi bonyana umuntu abe nedi gri, kufuneka kwaphela ii mfundo zeS1, zeS2 neba ndulo lelwandle. Kunge mva kwalokho lapho abantu  bazitlolisela khona ukuba batjhayeli beenkepe. Wathi, “Nangitjhayisako bengiya esikolweni ngifunde egade kwenziwa emini, ngalokho ngenza kokubili kanyeka nye”, wabeka watjho.
UMdletshe uthanda khulu ukuba ngemanzini. “Amanzi akutjela okunengi ngobuja mo belanga. Kamanye ama langa athule, kamanye aba neewuruwuru, kuyindawo enamatjhuguluko! Iinkepe nazo zakhiwe ngokwe hlukana ngobujamo godu zithwala ipahla engafani ko begodu kufuze zilawu lwe ngendlela ehlukileko,” kwatjho uMdletshe, othabe la ukusebenza nabasebenzi besikepeni beentjhabatjhaba ngokwamazwe ahlukileko.
Umsebenzi OneseleleUkuba mumuntu wengubo emkhakheni wezemalwa ndle “kubujamo obuyiselele” kwatjho uMdletshe, ohlathu lula ukudlanga kweendaba ezikhambisana nokukhethu lulwa ngokobulili njengo mbana ubunengi babasebenzi kubabantu bembaji.
Wathi, “Nanyana abomma balinga ukuzibumba ngo mnqopho wokuveza ikghono labo, kodwana kubudisi.
Ngaphumelela ekuninweni ngokuvala phetjheya, ngaba nommoya wokuzimisela no kusebenzisana ngalokho ba gcina sele bangihlonipha nge nca yomsebenzami. Nawuzi miseleko godu unommoya wokusebenza ngamandla, ungazisusa iinqabo endlela nakho”.
Ipumelelo kaMdletshe ekususeni iinqabo zomsebenzakhe ibonakele ngokutlonyeli swa kwakhe unongorwana wokuba mjaphethe wompha thi wezemisebenzi okha mba phambili. “Ngafumana unongorwana ngokuphuma phambili esikhathini esifitjha ni ngombana ngaphasa uku hlolwa ngeveke yokuthoma ngimjaphethe.” NgoSewula wee-2017 wafu mana uNongorwana wokuba ‘mtjhayeli weenkepe oyiku tani’ ngokuphulukisa iinkepe esiwuruwurwini esikhulu esakhe sabonwa e-Durban.
Wathi, “Ukuba mtjhayeli weenkepe kesinye isikhathi kutjho bonyana kufanele ufoye ube nesibindi”.
Ukuthweswa kwakhe idigri yesibili iMaster’s  kwenza umehluko omkhulu epi lwenakhe.
 “Ukufumana kwami idigri kwenza bona abasebenzisani bami abaduna bangihloniphe.
Bayangibuza qobe lilanga bonyana ngimajadu ngani ngombana sibabili kwaphela abakhambe bebafikelela kile libanga begodu ngingewo kuthoma owaqeda iimfundo ze-Maritime Diploma  eDoye lweni le-Durban. Lokhu kuko dwa kwangenza ngabonakala” wakutjho lokhu ngahlanye ahlathulula bonyana iimfundo ngezelwandle zibudisi.
Umsebenzi Womtjhayeli WeenkepeUMdletshe uhlathulula wabe ka wathi umtjhayeli weenkepe ulawula isikepe nabantu aban gakiso.
Kufuze aqinisekise bonyana iinsetjenziswa zokuphepha nezokuvikela nokucima umli lo zisebujameni obulungileko, enze ukuhlolwa kwesikepe kezokuphepha kwaqobe mnyaka, aqinisekise bonyana abasebenzi bafumana iba ndulo elifaneleko bebatlikitle neencwadi zabo zebandulo, ahlole ukubuyekezwa  komse benzi asize nabasebenzi bazi tlamele ihlelo lokuzithuthukisa elikhambisana nebizelo labo, asebenzise imithethomgomo yekhamphani alawule iindawo zokubeka ipahla noku-oda iinsetjenziswa.
Wathi, “Umsebenzi welanga uthoma ngerhelo leenkepe eziphumako nezingenako, ekufuze lilunge nakubetha isikhathi sokutjhayisa. “Sitho ma ngomsebenzi weenkepe nge-iri le-06h00 siqede nge-iri le-17h50. Abatjhayeli beenkepe basebenza ngababili, amunye wenza imisebenzi engaba bunane. Ngemva kwalokho sizalisa woke amaphepha.
Nakunobujamo oburhabako sitjhayisa ngemvanyana kweiri le-21h00”.

title: Ukutjhugulula Ubujamo Bezefundo Ephakemeko
author: Amukelani Chauke
text:
Njengombana ilizwe li gidinga iNyanga yeLutjha, i-Vuk’uzenzele  iqalisisa uku vulelwa kwelutjha amathuba wepumelelo ngamano wo mNyango wezeFundo  ePhakemeko nokuBandula.
Ukusukela ekuqatjhweni kwakhe ngoMhlolanja nje ngoNgqongqotjhe wezeFu ndo ePhakemeko nokuBa ndula, u-Naledi Pandor uni kelwe umsebenzi wokwethu la ngokweengaba ifundo yasimahla kabatlhagako nabafundi “abamaphakathi ngokwengeniso ekuthiwa ma-missing middle ”.
Ngemva kwemitjhaga lo eyarhatjheka nelizwe loke neyadosa isikhathi eside ngaphasi kommo ngo we#FeesMustFall , kwamenyezelwa ngoNo bayeni bonyana ilutjha eli buya emindenini lapho ingeniso yayo ingaphasi kwee-350 000 wamaranda ngomnyaka lizakufumana ifundo ephakemeko neba ndulo simahla. Sekuthonyi we nokwethulwa kwehle lweli elizokufakwa ngee ngatjana esikhathini esi minyaka emihlanu.
Isikhwama SomfundalizeUNgqongqo tjhe u-Pandor uqiniseki sile bonyana ukwethulwa kwesikhwama so mfundalize esitjha kukhamba kuhle.
Uthe; “Isikhwama somfu ndalize esitjhesi simphume la omuhle wokungenelela kukarhulumende weSewula Afrika, newabantu beSewula Afrika njengombana kungibo ababhadela intela ekusekelwa ngayo isikhwamesi”.
Isikhwama somfundalizesi sisiza abafundi abathomako eyunivesithi abalungelweko ngokobujamo beemali nalabo bemaKholiji weFundo yama Kghono neBandulo leThekni khali (ama-TVET), kiyo yoke iminyaka yokufunda kwabo.
Njengendlela yokusekela umfundalize lo ngeemali, kungezelelwe isabelo seemali sikarhulumende ngamabhili -yoni ali-7.166 wamaranda ngomnyaka wee-2018 – kanti amabhiliyoni ama-4.581 wamaranda abekelwe abafundi beyunivesithi abalungelweko namabhiliyoni ama-2.585 wamaranda abekelwe abafundi bemakholiji we-TVET.
UNgqongqotjhe u-Pandor uthe amakholiji anqophene neemfundo ezikhethekileko angaba maziko wepumelelo ekungiwo azokukhiqiza ama kghonofundwa aveleleko emikhakheni ethileko.
Isibonelo, wahlathulula ngokuthi ikholiji yinye inga nqophana kwaphela neemfu ndo zobunjiniyere imechanical engineering  enye iqalane ne zeemphaphamtjhini ekuyiaviation . Wangezelela ngokuthi, “Ngiyathemba ikusasa lama kholiji lizokweyama khulu eemfundweni ezikhethekileko.
“Sifuna ukuhlukanahlukana.
Asifuni woke amakholiji wethu anikele iimfundo ezifanako.” IHlelo lokuThuthukiswa kwabosomaBubulo kezeFundo ePhakemeko lihlonywe ngo mnyaka ogadungileko ngo mnqopho wokukhuthaza ilutjha bonyana lizitlamele amabubulo walo.
Kunqotjhwe ukulungelela nisa ukhutjhulwa komkha kha wezamabubulo ezikweni lezefundo yemayunivesithi ngeSewula Afrika. Lokhu kufaka hlangana zamabubulo kezefundo, ukukhutjhulwa kwamabhizinisi wabafundi namayunivesithi afundisa namkha abandulela ukutlama amabubulo.  UNgqongqotjhe u-Pandor uthe kunengi ekufuze kwe nziwe ukulungiselela ilutjha umsebenzi nokuthi babe baqa tjhi ngokwabo emikhakheni yemisebenzi ethe tjha.
Angathanda ukubona  amaziko wezefundo ephake meko ethula iimfundo zeza mabubulo kizo zoke iziqu oku sisenzo esizakusiza abafundi abasesebatjha ukuthoma ama bubulo angathuthukisa ikusasa lelizwe.

title: Umphakathi Ugidinga Ukubuyise lwa Inarha ebiza ama-R21 weengidi
author: Siya Miti
text:
Umphakathi we-Double Drift eduze neRhini unabantu abayi-1 500 abangebemindeni ema-264. UmBuso wezabelo we-Ciskei wabafudusa endawenabo ngomnyaka we-1991 ngomnqopho wokunikela amakhuwa inarha yokuhloma isiqiwu seenyamazana.
Umphakathi usandukwe mukela ubunikazi benarha (ama-Title Deeds), ebuyise lwe kibo ngaphasi kwehlelo lokubuyiselwa inarha.
NgokukaNdunakulu wePumalanga Kapa u-Phumulo Masualle, ama-21 weengidi zamaranda sezibekelwe ngeqadi ngomnqopho wokulungisa indaba yenarha nokudlulise lwa kwayo ebanikazini bayo ngokweengaba zakhona.
 “Leli ligadango eliqakatheke khulu emizamweni yokulonda iimvelo  nokuletha amatjhuguluko. Umsebenzi wenziwe ngefanele ukobana isiqiwu lesi seenyamazana sibe sezingeni lokuphalisana nezinye iinqiwu ngahlanye norhulumende usekela ngeemali zokubandula umphakathi,’’ kutjho u-Ma-sualle.
Umphakathi ngokusizana nabeenqiwu zeenyamazana i-Eastern Cape Parks  and Tourism Agency (i-ECPTA) ngaphasi kwe-Likhayalethu Communal Property Association (i-LCPA) bemukele iingidi ezisithandathu zamaranda emNyangweni weze Bhoduluko ukuthi bakghone ukusungula ibhizinisi kilo mkhakha weenyamazana esi qiwini esimahagere ayi-1400 abasithengelwe mNyango wokuThuthukisa iiNdawo zemaKhaya  nokuBuyekezwa kweNarha.
USihlalo we-LCPA, uMxolisi Ngesi uthi umphakathi ufake isibawo sokubuyiselwa inarha ngomnyaka we-1998. Ngomyaka wee-2012, amalunga womphakathi anikelwa amahagere azii-23 500 ngaphezulu kwalokho banikelwa isiqiwu seenyamazana esimahagere ayi-1400.
 “Sithabe khulu kwamanikelela ngombana ekugcineni sithole koke ebesikufuna. Urhulumende usiphe isizo leemali sakghona ukwenza imithangalasisekelo. Njenga nje sinesiqiwu seenyamazana ezifaka hlangana amaduba alitjhumi, iimbudumo ezili-15 neempofu ezili-10,” kutjho uNgesi bewangezelela ngokuthi iinyathi neembhalabhala zizokulethwa msinyana.
Ungezelele ngokuthi umpha kathi wathola ibandulo loku phatha nokulawula iinqiwu zeenyamazana kebakwa ECPTA.
“Ihlelo esinalo ngelokwakha iindawo zokulala ezimbili (ama-lodge), kodwana njenga nje sakha indawo yokuhlala abogadi besiqiwesi begodu nesibaya sokubeka iinyamazana ezifikako,” kutjho uNgesi.
 “Sesivulele amalunga wo mphakathi amathuba wemise benzi ama-61 lokha nakufakwa ifensi emakhilomitha alitjhumi neyege,” kutjho uNgqongqo tjhe wezeBhoduluko, u-Ednah Molewa ngesikhathi adlulisela emphakathini ngokusemthe thweni isiqiwu seenyama zana.

title: Sivulela Ilutjha le-KZN Amathuba Wemisebenzi
author: Hlengiwe Ngobese
text:
Abantu abatjha abama-25 baKwaZulu-Natala  bafunyene ibandulo bebathola imisebenzi ngoku vulwa kwebubulo elitjha lakwa-Mahindra.
Abasebenzi babandulwe ngokwecwephetjhe lamazwe ngamazwe yi-Mahin dra Group isebenzisana ne-AIH Logistics. Nakunesidingo bazokuthunyelwa e-India khona bazakufu nyana ibandulo elidepha dephileko.
Umsebenzi wokukhiqiza sewuthomile nanyana  usalingelelwa nje begodu kubekwe isilinganiso  sokukhiqiza iinkoloyi  ezizii-2000 ngomnyaka, ngokukhamba kwesikhathi inani leenkoloyi ezikhiqizwako lizakuba zii-4000 ngomnyaka.
“Ukusisokhu kuzakwenza bona amanye amabubulo abe nethemba phezu ko mnotho welizwe lekhethu. Lokhu kuyikomba yokobana isifunda saKwaZu lu-Natala siyindawo ehle nenothileko kezokusisa.
Lokho kuthumela umlayezo kilabo abanganathemba kilesisifunda ukobana bazi bonyana i-Durban yindawo engasetjenziswa kezamasiso,’’ kwatjho uSomkhandlu wezokuThuthukiswa komNotho, zokuVakatjha neze Bhoduluko uSihle Zikalala lokha nakuvulwa ifemu le.
Uveza bona amathuba womsebenzi abawuthomi leko erhwebeni azokuletha ukukhula kezamakghono esifundeni.
Omunye wabasebenzi  ongusonjiniyera ngokwe ziqu zakhe, nguSthembiso Mthembu othi uthabe khulu ngokufunyana umsebenzi lo.
 ‘’Bengihlezi ekhaya pheze umnyaka woke ngingatho li umsebenzi. Ithubeli lingisize khulu bonyana ngikghone ukuzondla nebomndenami. Ngineziqu zobunjiniyera bokulungisa kodwana akhange ngithole ithuba lokukhanda na mkha lokwakha ikoloyi. Ibandulo abasinikele lona lisisize khulu ukobana sibe nokuzithemba nelemuko lomsebenzi,’’ ubeke watjho.
IsiKhulu esiLawulako semiSebenzi yeenTjhaba tjhaba yakwa-Mahindra, u-Arvind Matthew uveza bona ikampani inqophe ukuthenga ama-40% wee nsimbi ze-Pik Up kubakhi qizi beSewula Afrika. ‘’Ukukhiqizwa kwe-Pik Up eSewula Afrika kuliga dango lokuthoma lamahlelo wethu wesikhathi eside, lawo azakungezelela ama thuba wemisebenzi esi -fundeni kunye namathuba wokuthengwa kweensimbi nezinye iinsetjenziswa zokukhanda namkha zo kwenza iinkoloyi KwaZu lu-Natala,’’ ubeke watjho .

title: Abosomabubulo abanzima bamakhe mikhali beFreyistata bavula amathu ba wemisebenzi
author: More Matshediso
text:
I-Kevali Chemicals iyikampani yokuthoma ephethwe babantu abanzima eFreyistata ekhiqiza amakhemikhali. Ikhiqiza ama khemikhali ahlukahlukene ko wokuhlwengisa amanzi, wokuhlanzekisa ngemakhaya nangeendlwaneni zangasese begodu nedlhu yokunamathi sela.
IKampani le yasungulwa ngomnyaka wee-2014 babantu abahlanu ababangani abane lwazi ngezamakhemikhali, ngezepahla ethingiseka msinyana, ngezokusungulwa kom khiqizo omutjha nokukhiqiza idlhu yokunamathisela.UmNqophisi oPhetheko wa kwa-Kevali Chemicals, uFune ka Khumalo uveza bona i-Black Industrialist Scheme isekele ikampanakhe ngokuyithengela imitjhini amathulusi neense tjenziswa zokusebenza.
Ungezelela ngokuthi “ekutho meni sabona kuqakathekile si fake imali yokuthoma irhwebo kodwana ngetjhudu ekugcineni safunyana isizo leemali emNyangweni wezeRhwebo namaBubulo (i-dti) ngokuyele liswa yi-Black Industrial Scheme (i-BIS) neHlangano eThuthukisa amaBubulo (i-IDC).
I-BIS lihlelo lesikhwama seemali somThethokambiso waboSomabubulo abaNzima elenzelwe ukuvulela abosoma bubulo abanzima beSewula Afrika amathuba emnothweni ngokubanikela isekelo ngeemali namkha ngokubathengela iinse tjenziswa elihleleke ngendlela ezabazuzisa ngefanelo.
UKhumalo uveza bona uku-thoma irhwebo kudle pheze iingidi ezili-18 zamaranda begodu kuthethe iinyanga ezi-li-11 ukobana ikampani yenze inzuzo.
Ikampani isabalalise imikhi qizwayo eSewula Afrika ma zombe neenarheni ezinje-Uga nda, Namibia ne-Tanzania.
UKhumalo uhlathulula bona umthelela omuhle wekampani le emaphilweni wabahlali bekhethwepha mkhulu uku dlula ukuvula kwayo amathuba wemisebenzi.
 “Ngaphezu kokuvulela izakhamuzi amathuba wemisebenzi, sinamahlelo wokwenyula umphakathi emirarweni yezehlalakuhle nangokusekela abantu bengubo bemalokitjhini nebeendaweni zemakhaya abahlela ukuvula amarhwebo amancani ngamakghono abanawo wokukhiqiza ama khemikhali wokuhlwengisa ngemakhaya nangeendlwaneni zangasese”, ubeke watjho.
Uveza bona abosomabubulo abasakhasako kumele bazi bonyana akusilula ukuthoma irhwebo kodwana kufanele bangapheli iinhliziyo ngombana ngokukhamba kwesikhathi bazokufumana umvuzo woku zikhandla kwabo.
ISekela likaNgqongqotjhe we-dti uBulelani Magwanishe uthe, iKevali ifanele ihlonitjhwe ngokuba yikampani yokuthoma esemkhakheni wokukhi qiza amakhemikhali, iinhlahla neemplastiki ukobana isekelwe ngeemali ngaphasi kweHlelo laboSomabubulo abaNzima uku sukela ngomnyaka wee-2016.
 “IKampani le izokuvula ama thuba wemisebenzi etlhogwa khulu babantu bemiphaka thini ezombeleze i-Harrismith labo ababanjwe mtlhago woku ngasebenzi,’’ kutjho iSekela likaNgqongqotjhe uMagwa nishe.

title: I-NHI Iligadango Elinqophe Ukuthuthukisa Zamaphilo
author: vukuzenzele unnamed
text:
U-Motsoaledi gade akhulu ma mhlapha emhlanganweni weembikiindaba lapho ethule isiKhibelelo somThethomli ngwa we-NHI nesiKhibele lo somThethomlingwa wee Nkimu zezokweLapha.
ImiThethomlingwa le izoku hlahla indlela yokufikelela zokwelapha lula ngaphasi kwehlelo le-NHI.
Umthethomlingwa litlha tlha lomthetho ohlongo zwako. ImiThethomlingwa eminengi itlanywa minya ngo karhulumende ngelayelo likaNgqongqotjhe womnya ngo loyo. Kufuze umThetho mlingwa uphasiswe yiKhabi nethi ngaphambi kokobana uthunyelwe ePalamende.
Ukwethulwa kwemiThetho mlingwa emibili le kutjho iragelophambili leSewula Afrika ekufikeleleni isizo lezamaphilo labo boke aba ntu okutjho bona i-NHI izoku ba mthetho msinyana.
I-NHI lihlelo elisekela  ngeemali elizokuqinisekisa bona zoke izakhamuzi ze Sewula Afrika zinikelwa itjhe jo lezamaphilo ezilitlhogako, kungayi ngobujamo bomse -benzabo nokukghona ukuzi bhadelela.
UDorh. Motsoaledi uthe urhulumende uyelele bona abanye abantu bajame kelo kuthi kufuze kulungiswe qangi ihlelo lezamaphilo lo mphakathi ngaphambi koku thi bekukhulunywe nge-NHI.
Uthe urhulumende uyazazi iintjhijilo zezinga elibogabo gako nokungasebenzi nge fanelo kwehlelo lezamaphilo womphakathi.
UDorh. Motsoaledi uthe umTlamo wokuThuthukiswa kweliZweloke (i-NDP) uku tshwaye ngaphandle koku zaza ukuthi ngokuphunyele liswa kwe-NHI iinsiza zezama philo ezibogabogako neemali ezitjhisako zesizo lezamaphilo langeqadi kufuze kulungiswe.
Kusakhulunyiswana ngee nKhibelelo zemiThethomli ngwa le, umnyango uzokusu ngula okungasenani nga maphrojekthi amane azokufa ka hlangana isizo lezamaphilo eenkolweni, isizo lezamaphi lo kabaphazamiseke ngoko mkhumbulo, abomma abasi disi abanemiraro yezamaphilo eembhedlela ezima-22 ezithi nteke khulu nangokwelatjhwa kwekankere, i-oncology  ku tjhejwe khulukhulu ukusiza e-Gauteng naKwaZulu-Nata la, nokho-ke ezinye iimfunda azikazukuliselelwa.
UDorh. Motsoaledi uthe izakhamuzi ezinengi azisa kghoni ukufikelela iinsiza zezamaphilo zangeqadi  ngonobangela wokuphaka ma khulu kweemali zeensiza lezo, ngebangelo iKomitjhini yezamaPhaliswano ikhombele iJaji eliKhulu langaphambilini uSandile Ngcobo ukobana enze iphenyo ngeemali zee nsiza zezamaphilo zangeqadi kilomkhakha.
Uthe “Iinkhibelelo esizethu lako zinqophe ukwethula iingulani umthwalo weemali ezizifumana zikiwo”.
U-Motsoaledi uthe isikhi belelo sokuthoma somThe thomlingwa kuzakuba nge sokuphelisa iimali ezibhade lwa ziingulani kibodorhodera ngaphezu kwemali ekhutjhwa eenkimini zabo zokwelatjhwa.
Iimali ezibhadelwa ziingu lani zitjho bonyana iskimu sibhadela ingcenyana yema li ebizwe sibhedlela namkha ngudorhodera kuthi enye ibhadelwe sigulani. Imali eseleko kufuze iphume esi khwanyeni sesigulani ngo kwaso.

title: Ipilo Nayikuvulela Amathuba, Asebenzise
author: Amukelani Chauke
text:
IHlelo lokuSekela noku Thuthukisa abaLimi lisize ilutjha elifana no-Wayne Mansfield (oneminyaka ema-33) odabuka e-Paarl, ogade athengisela uso nghwanakhe eMarageni weKapa ngamalanga laya asafunda isikolo wazoku ba mlimi okhiqiza abosuru enarheni ayiqatjhileko abese ubathumela emazweni wa ngaphetjheya.
Eminyakeni elitjhumi eya dlulako, u-Mansfield nagade amrhwebi osakhasako one minyaka ema-23, waziphu ndisa ngethuba lokusebe nza eplasini lapho beka funyana namkha beka thenga khona abosuru  azobathengisa.
